review: You work hard to earn points. All you want is to earn a loot box AND get an item you haven't received before. Then they add these keys where you have to pay 2.50 to open a loot box you already have. So you have a diminishing percentage chance of getting an item you don't already have from the normal lootboxes (also the models for MOST of the items look like something a 12 year old would think is cool but a few look nice) and NOW there is a 50% chance that you will have to pay 2.50 to get an item at all. Considering earning points is hard enough now unless you want to shovel more of your money into the game 1/2 the time you are just wasting points. Clearly the public has spoken about loot boxes but I guess Blue Hole didn't hear them. It's not enough that literally millions of people bought their game now they have to milk it. This is potentially a good game it has WAY more problems than a game that generates this amount of money should but I'm giving a negative review on the basis of corporate greed ing over the player once again.

review: As of this reveiw I don't reccomend this game. It is very buggy glitchy unoptimised and hard to run. I do understand it's in Early Access and will get better. It is alot of fun and does have a steep learning curve. Make sure you have a good graphics card and good cooling for it. As for now I do love this game. Personally I have alot of fun even though I have not won yet but it is still enjoyable. Especially with friends its even better. But I would wait for this game to get better and make a decision then. I do also have to criticise Bluehole for saying they wouldn't add payed content but then later on adding it in.August 31st 2017 Edit Right now I think the game has gotten a bit better and I am enjoying it a lot better and am deciding to change my reccomendation. I hope to see what they do in the future with the new map guns mechanics.December 18th 2017 Update The game has been released on Xbox and I am sad to say there has not been much improvement to the PC version. It is pretty much unplayable on console from what I have seen and I am dissappointed taht they decided to release it on console before even making the game beter on PC.

review: As a grown adult with a full time job I don't have an excess amount of time to just play games. Therefore when I do have a couple hours in the evening or on the weekend to sit down and play a game it is dedicated time I've set aside for it. PUBG is usually fun to play those times I'm actually able to get a couple hours in however there are just too many reasons not to bother spending money on this game. First are the cheaters/hackers and this has improved by the time of this writing only some of the games I've been able to play have an aimbot or speed cheater on them but when they're there it completely ruins the time spent playing. Another problem is lag that even on a broadband connection in an urban area not only affects combat in the game but simply opening doors driving vehicles or attempting to place a landing while parachuting in. Another and probably most infuriating issue is the constant client and server updates being performed during prime gaming hours on the servers in that region which make it unplayable for me that day. I'm a fan of updates to fix the issues with the game but they are clearly so poorly timed and without any warning that it is a complete crap shoot whether I will be able to sit down and play that day or try again another day in hopes the servers are not "too busy". Save your money and look to other well established shooters that don't rely on such a poorly managed server based gameplay. Maybe it will be worth $10 fire sale pricing in a year if they get their bugs cheaters and server update schedules sorted.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

I have GTX 1060 6GB and my friend has a GTX 1050TI and when we select optimized settings on Geforece Experience the GTX 1050TI user's graphics settings are set to mostly high and ultra while me on the other hand gets optimized to mostly low and very low settings. WTF?!cheaters cheaters and more cheaters. I know you can't eradicate them at all but at least have a decent game guard or something.I won't recommend this game because of these and other known issues with this game and the fact that I you have to around $15 for this game in its current condition is simply a stupid idea.

review: I Played Playerunknown's Battleground for several hours as solo player but also in duo and in squad. It is a really fun game on the first hours of gameplay since you are happy to discover a new game map items to loot and mechanics.But after you get used to it the frustration begins the game is still bugged as hell and some of your frags(and even a LOT OF your frags) will get trolled by environment and bugs on the gameplay mechanics and shooting mechanics. This game is good and have a good potential but still needs a huge work from devs in order to be "playable". I recommend you this game but not for the moment you should just wait that the game is developed most. For the moment it is just a bugged version of H1Z1. But when PUBG will be finished it will be a realistic game like survival/simulation/shooter. So don't buy it now unless you wanna support the game and help devs to fix the many bugs and issues. Just wait they release the Beta.

review: I couldn't tell anyone to buy this game right now. 3/10.The bad The hackers every other review addresses these. As a fairly high position player(under 1000 rank in duo third person) I see hackers atleast every 3rd game. Its rampant and awful. It will be the death of this game if they can't correct it soon.The map it has random point on it that you will hit while driving that will bring you to a dead stop damage you your passengers and your vehicle. These are undetectable and strike at random. The desync at points you will shoot an enemy and see blood sprays but they will not register with the other player. Sometimes you will shoot at a distant enemy and your bullet will seemingly vanish. Or from your screen you will be softly peeking over a hill but on the other side you will be exposing yourself fully. This is especially noticeable early game. It's hard to say how bad it is on a normal basis but its there and leaves the game feeling imprecise. This is perhaps most noticeable as a passenger in a vehicle. You will see it hitting objects and going in all manner of odd directions while the driver is driving perfectly normally down the road. Its rather bad.The good When you don't encounter cheaters this game is highly rewarding and challenging. There is a wide range of ways to play that can all be effective. My squad won a game yesterday without firing a single shot in fact we simply out maneuvered all the other squads and had a zero encounter game win. Not saying this is my ideal but it shows that no matter what type of player you want to be there is room for the play. Guns feel distinct and different. Action is fast and intense. Ability to aim and fight is equal to the need to use cover and plan your positioning on the fly as the randomized circles don't allow for the same plan every game. My conclusion I will change this review to a 9/10 if they could simply reduce the hackers. Its rampant. From full blown shoot you through the wall at 800m away all the way down to rampant no recoil scripting. Depending on the day anywhere from 30% of my games to 50% of my games have blatant hackers. I am sure more than that have the recoil scripting. The other issues are nominal and could be addressed.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: This game is decent addictive and at rare occasions fun. But I can't recommend it with a clear conciousness as the hacking community is strong and vibrant the game is optimized horribly the servers are bad stuff takes ages to load. The community is probably the most toxic one I have encoutered so far (I dont play any LoL/DOTA etc.) on North American servers there is like 98% chinese players who do not speak english even tho they claim they do. On EU you need to play with voice off otherwise it's just Russian Gopniks shouting insults and playing hardbass. The amount of times I got screwed over by someone shooting me through a wall by shooting the ground or just dying randomly due to a bug is insane. Things got a bit better after it went out of early access but a few weeks later it's back to the good 'ol PUBG with it's random crap. If you have some friends that also play this and you can team up for some quality fun I reckon it might be worth it cause at least you can share the pain.

review: This game is by far my favorite game on the market. Many poor reviews are frustrated players who can't seem to win. This game involves skill tactical skills awareness etc. There are many pros to this game which include the realism to it. Bullet drop/ trajectory damage dealt by certain guns and overall just very realistic. Although this game does have some pretty bad cons. These include hackers glitches and laggy servers. HACKERS Honestly everyone complains about hackers but i've only come across a few in the 200 hours spent. I've only ever died by a hacker 2 times and this was when i was playing duos or squads. GLITCHES I've encountered a glitch one time and this was a motorcylce getting stuck and blew up randomly. LAGGY SERVERS Sometimes you will be put into laggy servers from time to time do not get frustrated it usually passes within the first 10 minutes. ps Not all servers are laggy about 10% are laggy *stick to your region* Overall the game is very competitive and very very fun... once you get used to it. SIDE NOTESGame involves skill dont go guns blazing into a firefight time it perfectly and always be aware of your surroundings. Do not be shy! You need to be aggressive and not be scared to fight when it is needed. Always keep your inventory clear and not filled with stupid items like 5 grips for your m4 that you already have equipped etc. Always play with a headset so you can hear footsteps and gunfire. UPDATE REVIEWSome things i noticed with the new update as of April 2nd 2018 is that the redzone has become much more dangerous. Guns seem to be a little bit decreased in damage such as the sks. UMP has seemed to increase damage. (that is not 100% correct just what i feel i noticed)

review: After a Third person game?Dont. You'll get cheated into oblivion by hackers.After a First Person game with constant action every couple minutes (CSGO CoD BF style)?Don't. The NRG will make you cry. Even if you do come out on top early game unless you actively seek action and get lucky you'll have a quite 10 15 minutes.After a semi realistic slow paced at times hectic at other strategic shooter in an elimination format winner takes all?THEN GET ON IT! Most of these negative reviews about 'issues' are old or full of Lag/Desync? Haven't experienced that in 4 5 months. Blaming the game for your potato internetPoor frame rates? I get 80 100 with everything onn ultra besides shadows/foilage i5 3570K 16gb DDR3 with a 1060 6gb fairly average PC. Blaming the game the game for your potato computerCheaters in FPP? The amount of confirmed/suspected cheaters I have encountered I would put less than 20 in my 400+ games (have a 40% win rate this season). Blaming the game for your potato skill.Game Breaking Bugs? Yeah they exist (had an exploding motorbike last night. RIP) but they are so rare (2nd time in 400+ games) or are just a minor annoyance rather than 'game breaking' Hello items soemtimes disappearing under the map when you drop them or lobby bugs.

review: 网络爆炸了几天 一直点不开回复 今天修复了以后发现回复巨多恰好事后觉得很多地方存在语序不通 观点不充分的地方 重新订正一下听说糯米洗白了 回来补一篇测评 当时黄老仙怼糯米事一出 蓝洞公司迅速出手封停了糯米的账号 随着糯米账号被封 与之关联的直播平台也迅速出手 封停了糯米的直播间 国内玩家拍手称快的同时 一场席卷全国的锤外挂大戏也就此拉开了帷幕 最终 这场大戏以知名主播卢XX被央视点名而达到了高潮 然而这场轰轰烈烈的外挂大战已经过去半年多 国内的外挂不仅没有锤干净 反而越锤越多 而且由外挂引发的信任危机 已经开始弥漫在中国的吃鸡圈子里 言说至此 争论谁开挂谁没有开挂已经没有任何意义 因为蓝洞公司对外发布的消息才是我们认可的唯一标准 换句话说 你们说开挂就开了 你们不说话就是没开 我现在开始同情那些锤主播的人们 冒着被人肉 被线下警告的风险去锤 却得不到一个铿锵有力的官方回应 槽了这么长时间蓝洞的外挂 不如让我们来回忆一下半年的时间里 蓝洞的反挂表现如何呢 仅就公布出来的信息而言 让我印象最深的就是腾讯公布了要代理绝地求生后 抓了几只出头鸟 更多的我们看到的 往往是停机更新新版本后 外挂便死灰重燃 对比其他游戏公司的反挂经历 蓝洞真的还差得远以暴雪为例 暴雪游戏的死对头Bossland最近全线下线暴雪游戏外挂 在bossland研制出守望兄弟 彻底触动了暴雪的逆鳞后 仅用了一年半的时间 德国茨维考对Bossland下达了最终裁定书 要求Bossland停止对暴雪的侵权行为 随后Bossland转而开发绝地求生外挂 蓝洞你真的快成了公交车 尽管暴雪算不上一个特别完美的游戏公司 但在反挂这一方面 暴雪宁可得罪玩家 也要把反挂进行下去 Bossland的彻底崩盘 其实并不是在法庭上败给了暴雪 更大一方面是外挂厂商无力保证使用外挂用户的账号安全 暴雪在17年12月更新了自己的暴雪游戏平台 并在后台安置了一个全程扫描可疑程序的系统 来自魔兽兄弟垮台时的告别信 这可以说是很严重的侵犯用户隐私的行为 但不得不说 它很有效 直到现在 很多魔兽世界外挂都没能想出一个完美的对策来保障自己客户的账号安全 仅就目前的国内情况而言 我们不得不承认国内的维权难度和监管难度给外挂提供了一片适宜生长的土地 往往打击外挂只能依靠游戏厂商主动报警立案后 警方才会对外挂制作方予以打击 像蓝洞这种在大陆没有分公司的企业 想要打击外挂恐怕只能依靠这个 不稳定的合作商 腾讯 来处理外挂 换句话说 蓝洞把PUBG代理权交给腾讯 那腾讯就帮你打击外挂 反之 腾讯也可以抱着多一事不如少一事的心态围观你在大陆玩家中口碑日益下跌的窘境 但话说回来 自身品质不过硬 说什么都是没用的 目前PUBG外挂遍地开花 严重程度乃至于游戏源代码泄露一般 也有人说游戏源代码早早泄露 其实玩家更希望的不是你们对开外挂的玩家仅仅使用一个简单的封停处理 更希望他们在使用外挂 破坏别人的游戏体验前得到制裁 例如无法顺利进入游戏 检测到异常情况被强制中断游戏等等 所以就现在而言 蓝洞还远远不及 不负责任的阴谋论 腾讯早已开始染指大逃杀一类的游戏 老牌游戏H1Z1 后起之秀堡垒之夜 2018年初央视在点名PUBG后 很有可能国服PUBG的审查会出现一定的难度 届时腾讯如果很难将国服PUBG落实 也可能转而向国内玩家推荐中文化已久 且大逃杀游戏模式下更容易过审的堡垒之夜 关于锁区 好吧 其实每个玩家心里都有数 这个游戏腾讯宣布代理的那天 就已经有传言 将来为了国服的正常游戏 蓝洞会对大陆ip进行锁区 至于已购买steam版本的绝地求生的大陆ip玩家还能否正常进行游戏呢 请参考隔壁 火箭联盟 然而真正让我不满的 是蓝洞自打自脸的所作所为 既然你无力应对中国外挂厂商的轮番攻势 那请你光明正大的表示出来 不要一边接受采访时说 尽管大部分使用外挂的玩家来自中国 但我们不能因此一棒子打死所有的中国玩家 一边又搞什么ping值匹配模式 专用地区服务器 反而把外挂圈起来由中国玩家自己消化 如果你觉得98元人民币不值你们这款游戏的价格 那请上调你的游戏价格 我们中国玩家不想被当作二等公民来看待 如果你觉得我们这帮98元人民币买到你这款游戏的玩家和那些喊着锁中国区的外国玩家是一个地位的 好 请你加大力度打击那些使用外挂的玩家 而不是来封禁我们 这些来自中国 使用外挂的玩家让 Chinese 这个优秀而光荣的名词在这个游戏里背上了 挂B 的名分 在这个游戏里我不认同他是中国人 说到这 我甚至都有些同情 H1Z1 了 人家当时就是看不起中国玩家 宁肯挨骂也要锁区 两边都不想得罪结果两边都得罪 人家连锁区锁的都比你有骨气 今天 我在这篇评测里喷蓝洞不只是你的反挂不力 让我失去了耐心而是你的所作所为 看不出是一个拥有千万级受众作品的公司 反而像一个刚刚成立的小作坊 难道你们在steam上发行绝地求生后 公司没有一点的成长吗 从我入手这款游戏后 你们的所作所为很顺利的刷新了我的认知下限一个游戏厂商在自己的游戏里打起了 专用加速器迅游 的广告两个主播互怼 自己先仓促封号 事到如今又不得不解封账号 你们公司的公信力何在 更让人难以相信的是一个游戏公司竟然被曝出区域负责人因为和女友不和而闹出受贿等等的丑闻 蓝洞公司也算开了游戏业界的先河了吧 今天 糯米洗白了 祝福糯米 祝他将来的事业一番风顺 如果芦苇将来也能洗白的话 我还会祝他的事业一帆风顺 尽管我对我的测评作了一定量的修改 可如果你们真的因为反挂系统难以为继 那就早早放弃绝地求生这款游戏 膨胀到开发3A大作吧我还是祝你们公司出一部作品暴死一部 Fxck You Blue hole

review: Started playing this really late only when they released 1.0 and got out of BETA. Before I purchased this game a lot of heat was on it due to the fact there were a lot of hackers. I though getting out of BETA would fix the problem. Well apparently not. First few games I played got killed by players who can't even see me from their screens based on the death cam. Seriously it was humanly impossible to see me behind the leaves of a tree after he just turned around (which means he did not see me approach). DO NOT BUY THIS GAME! DON'T WASTE MONEY GETTING CONSTANTLY KILLED BY HACKERS!
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: It's a fun game which has a load of potential.Don't buy it just yet tho. 1) The servers are like they're being hosted in North Korea you often rubber band and can never actually pick UP.2) The net code is also complete trash meaning there's a huge delay on when damage has been taken and you can end up like me where you're halfway across a field and then fling back and are dead cause the game took 5 minutes to register you got hit.3) The game shouldn't be out of early access its unfinished buggy and it feels like the devs don't listen to the players.Overall it's a good game with just some game breaking bugs. I recommend it but don't buy it yet let it get more stable first.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Is this game perfect? no.is this game polished? no.does this game evoke actual emotion and investment evey time you load into a match? absolutely.If you're expecting to get lots of kills and cant take accepting that other players are better or that sometimes people get lucky or that sometimes you screwed up a situation then this game isnt for you. If you're looking for a game that will challenge you the most out of any multiplayer experience this is it.If you hate hackers play fpp for some reason hackers hate fpp. and that being said in 350 hours of playing i have not experienced enough hackers for me to consider this game broken. i've encountered under 20 hackers so far and let's be honest I probably wasn't gooing to win thoseee games anyway. This game is getting better. the devs are listening to the fan base and trying to balance everything yeah sometimes they make a mistake. But more often than not they go back and fix said mistake. I am looking forward to the future of PUBG and hope the community will continue to grow.

review: The biggest complaint about the game itself is the performance. I don't like having to turn my high end pc to low settings to play anything. I'm sure this will improve as time passes but I wouldn't recommend buying unless you have the hardware to run it.The real reason I'm giving thumbs down is the problematic dynamic that exists between players streamers and the developers. This game has been succesful because of effecting WOMM (word of mouth marketing) on the part of the developers using streamers as influencers to attract a wider audience.However this has resulted in streamers being put on a pedestal on part of the devs and mostly this haas been ok. However some entitled why brats who don't realize how good they have it to get to play games for a living have totally ruined this wantonly getting people banned. It's the equivalent of a 5 year old getting to kick anyone they want out of the playground.Until the developers realize that ultimately it's the players who put in their dollars into the game and not streamers my review will stay like this and I won't be recommending the game to any friends.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Solid game but takes some work to get into and fully understand everything. Maybe a tutorial for new players would be handy. Pacing is a little slow but never find it boring. Usually just tense. Good fun to play with friends and can play with anywhere between 2 and 4 players. Mechanics are solid but some small things are being improved like new upcoming vaulting mechanics etc.

review: Regardless of what people may think this is in fact the best of the battle royal games. The most simple way to put it is that it's the most serious of them all. The combat flows well from encounter to next encounter but is tight enough to land shots move possitions and play with your enemies minds. The zone can feel slow in solo but fast in squads making those two moods feel like a different game. No other battle Royale game is as serious as this game takes it making sure everything feels as realistic as possible. The one thing I will say is that it's best to play with friends you'll find yourself having a ton of fun no matter if you win or lose.

review: Battle Royale is kind of a mess right now. All these games are scrambling to be the best when there is no such thing.PUBG is for those who like it a bit more realistic. No 6 damage shotgun no giving weapons tiers no flying around or getting flung by impact grenades etc etc. PUBG feels more like a royale closer to ARMA. You have to be tactical and working with your team actually feels like you're a squad. Solos give you a spooky feeling and you either go guns ablazing or take the sneaking route. Vehicles are a little hard right now and have some issues but they work. Bikes are scary to use as you can hit a small texture and fly away or die. Gun fights feel very smooth with bullet drop being decent and many scopes available. There is quite a few attachments a variety of gear and getting a win feels damn good. Overall 7/10.

review: *Update* Changed from Down vote to an Up vote. There is significantly less cheating mods not sure why specifically when you play first person only mode (FPP). This mode is much more fair and I have seen less cheating. Much less. My deaths have been reasonably fair which makes me feel a lot better about the direction of the game development. This game would be super fun if it weren't for the fact that 7 out of 10 times I am killed it's by a person who is cheating and doesn't even have to target me correctly. They just barely have me in their scope and they can shoot anywhere and I die. I was killed with a headshot while I was driving a truck the person was aimed behind me not in front of my direction of travel and they were 1000m away. Boom headshot. These people suck at this game and they are "winning". Pathetic. I bet they can't keep a job because they have to actually earn a living. Until The cheating clears up I can't say I suggest playing this game. Right now it might as well be called "Player Unknown's Run for 30 minutes then die".

review: For any of those who were around when BattleField 4 was released that is what you will get with this game. This game suffers from so many issues when it comes down to lag. I would watch my death cam and watch helplessly as my bullets strike my opponent but no damage is taken. There s even blood being displayed that my opponent was shot BUT nothing! There are times when I m running and I ll die right after I get behind cover. Other times I ll be completely covered by a wall and I ll still take damage from enemy fire. The peek system is also contributes to the problem. There had been many times I ll peek to fire back and peek right back behind cover and take damage. Reason why the game lags behind so bad that even though I m behind cover on my screen the death cam reveals that I was still peeking out of cover. I am so thankful the death cam was added so I can make sense of what happened. There are many times I swear it s a hacker but the death cam just reveals that it is the games horrible lag to be blamed.The final issue I have is the character unresponsiveness. It is such a dumb reason to die because your character finally went prone or crouch down a second later when you pressed the key or command. In this game a lot can happen in a second. This leads to another issue. Whenever I discharge my weapon tag the unresponsiveness on top of the slight lag and it s a pain to hit anything that s moving and jumping around. Should you ever buy this game and be the lucky few to make it in the top 5 see players sprinting jumping and bunny hopping. It s because we all know how speed combine with lag and unresponsiveness nearly makes you impossible to hit.

review: Played quite a lot back in the start of it all. Games fun and these games give you a rush but br is getting old it came a long way from a little minecraft mod. New map is actuslly very thought out no major chokes like the firdt map. Lot of skilless players out there that talk and need to be taught a lesson. Thats now the best part. GreAt with friends avoid the new small map tho thr netcode is not ready for a pubg fortnight map. Rip BR so tired of you. This br isnt about dumbing down a game so everyone can play. If you suck you will get shot. If you dont plan then a good ampunt of time you will get shot. If you havent played somethingike this then try it out its wortg the money. But for now the game is really tilting.EDIT So the game's loot has changed so much now its really easy to get really good equipments i need to say this.

review: Edit 2017/9/02you get banned for honking at streamers so please dont get this game.&gt Drops in a place with one other guy&gt I shout "TRUCE! dont attack me and I wont attack you"&gt him "okay I wont"&gt we both loot a house together&gt he gets a shotgun&gt i got a p1911*reloading*&gt him"The stronger shall be higher up bye bye mudblood"*shoots me in the face*10/10But in all seriousnessNeeds optimization but Good gameplay needs alot more to be added(maps game mods guns use of coins other than one item etc) to justify 30$ price tag but its still in early access so that'll change in coming months.Game is kinda glitchy at some points items spawn inside floors or walls audio quality is under average and needs to improve.If you dont like issues and glitches of a incomplete game stay away until the end of its early access period 3 months have already passed so another 3 months is left before it does.and please have a gpu with a minimum of 2GB vram( for lowest 1080p) and 4GB (for medium).The game significantly improved in performance (in the Beta 1.0 test servers) so the final game will run atleast 30 40% better on your current system and with no sudden lag spikes.update 2018/2/22game has some good amount of optimizations compared to beta Im seeing around 15 25fps more and very little lag spikes but I think they need to optimize even more because the game's graphics still does'nt justify the system requirements. Cheaters exist but good to see they're working on their anti cheat every few updates and banned ton of cheaters.vehicle crash physics is F U C C D! you can't even go over a little bump without flipping over and also you cant crash another vehicle or they will become conjoined and explode.This game is still not good enough to be labled as "out of early access and launched" It still needs ton of work to be even considered as such. Do I like this game? hell yes Do I like playing? Sometimes and sometimes stupid things like hitreg and vehicle physics cause my death. PLEASE WORK ON THE GAME RATHER THAN IMPLIMENTING MORE LOOTBOXES! FIX THE VEHICLES AND SERVER SIDED HITREG!! until these are fixed I will not recommend this gameAlso the directional audio is basically non existent on this game. the sound is either on the left or right no proper direction. PLZ FIXupdate 2018/4/14I rarely play the gamr anymore mostly because there hasnt been any major changes in the game and also very presistant bugs from the Alpha state still exist bad vehicles physics and very bad server side hitreg throughout the game. Sounds are have been reworked but still alot left to be desired because there's still no surround only Stereo its very difficult to know from where you're being shot at because the game lacks surround sound.also I'm getting about 3 5fps higher in both erangel and miramar but I think it needs to be optimized further more at the same settings as before and The new map which is still very much in alpha runs a little worser but its being worked on so I hope it runs as good as the current maps already in the game and also the new map is much better 1/4th the size of current maps 16 km2 compared to 64km2 in erangel and mirarmar which makes the game more intense and closely packed together player locations.The number of cheaters have reduced greatly since the major ban hammer wave during jan feb but 1/10 chance of getting into a game with a cheater compared to 1/3 games. 5 things that need to fixed/optimized and also addedBetter Servers futher more optimization surround sound vehicle physics and Map selection.I still do not recommend the game because they seem more interested in loot boxes and key sales rather than fixing major bugs from the alpha state as mentioned. UPDATE 2018/06/02I haven't play PUBG in eitherity of may because lack of content but today I decided to play it again just to see the improvements madeThe game finally has Surround sound/HRTF. the game runs much more smoother and the freuqent stuttering is gone I can also see about 15 20Fps gain in different areas compared to before new weapons have been added and also a new car New map is right around the corner from release and Well i'm just feeling better about PUBG again like I felt a year back when it came in early access.The game is getting the updates and changes I wanted for a really long time hopefully when the third map is out. I'll get back to playing it more regularly.for the first time of multiple review updates and changes I can finally recommend buying this game but you can wait for a bit longer until summer sales and see then if the game is even better by then or not.

review: Updated review as of 17th August 2017.The game is poorly optimized both in terms of GPU and net code.As of now I can safely say that PUBG is the current big of gaming and the trend that many companies will try to ride on. While at first I couldn't get into the 'play worm simulator for 30 min die from a random bullet in 1 second' a dozen hours is enough to get hooked and realize that there's much more to skill in this game than luck.If Overwatch / Battlefield is too fast and too much arcade for you and ARMA is too hardcore try this. The pace of this game fits its own niche and the game mode is far too unique to be ignored.While the game still has some problems (high tick rate and questionable gameplay fluidity) one can't help but notice that it's very polished for an EA game. Also devs are rolling out patches very frequently and if I'm any judge they'll actually leave Early Access soon enough as promised.

review: 像開放世界的生存或第一人稱射擊類型的許多其他遊戲一樣 PUBG的主要目標是成為最後一個活著的玩家 但是PUBG並沒有納入體裁規範 這需要開放式世界遊戲的一些最好的方面 把它與一個優秀的第一人稱射擊遊戲的機制相結合 並容納一個典型的MMO玩家基地 遊戲元素也有很好的平衡 例如 你可以選擇在地圖上跳傘的地方 每個人都是在沒有武器的情況下開始的 而且還有一個致命的巨大閃爍的藍色穹頂 每隔一段時間就會減少可玩區域 此外 還有從上面進行的隨機炸彈襲擊 向徵用者提供了大量的水陸交通工具 還有一幅廣闊而詳細的地圖

review: Dear developers I like the game. Let's start there. Battle royal is a fun concept and sure is addictive. I understand it's early access. I do. But your game exploded and gained so many players and you sure have made a lot I mean a lot of money. There are NO excuses in this situation to not work on this game around the clock. Expand your team whatever. This should have massive improvments. Weekly. In other words don't be DayZ or H1Z1. Otherwise people will hate you. Trust me it's not recommended in this industry. Probably the main issue for people would be the performance side. Optimaztion. the content for now it has enough and people are enjoying it so far. Get the game to work well first. Edit 360 hours in 8 months since my review and the game stands still. It's addictive I'll give it that.The loot box system is a complete insult. There's no performance improvements and the audio of the game really makes it difficult to understand your surroudings. The amount of money they made is ridiculous. Considering that I'd say this was a classic early access money grab. New lootboxes which can give you a paid crate you didn't ask for and purchased with your hard earned battle points and when you do get free one it's a pair of ing brown shoes. your 86th pair of brown shoes..A new map you know to keep us happy. Get your ing together BlueHole.Edit 2 Well yeah I've kept playing. But that. This is a very very poorly managed game company. I don't know who makes decisions there but this just isn't good.

review: A game with mechanics and genre i dreamed about long ago as a kid. But there never was a chance of seeing something like that at the time.Time passes things change. And so did gaming industry. With all the money and technology coming into the industry it quickly became a place for passion and fun that some people like me enjoyed for some time.But time still passes and things still change. You start to see less titles with proper design and solutions and more moneygrab half raw products with no dedication to the final product.Then crowdfunding comes in. We get promises devs get final user expectations to meet(or do they now?). Plus making a game is no longer that much risky if you get your money first and then stretch time frames to the ones you are comfortable with. And you also have a wall to hide behind if someone is getting impatient. Because early access right? Sadly yeah.Then come the consoles with which you need to cut production costs by all means to gain profit. Console hardware becomes less competitive so what do you do? Develop for the consoles first and then port usually making pc experience somewhat hindered.Money took over the industry. The most of it. Its not that bad but i really miss the times where i bought a game and could expect full scaled single player proper settings(hard fps locks on pc? please!) fresh titles new experience and so on.Then with industry rising come popularity. People make games a meaningful part of its society so now its on the devs to make games appeal to buyers investors managers so they would sell more. Its just not about passion or fun anymore. Not about perfection or stuff that makes sense.Greed corrupts. Not really an eye opener i know but i miss skill ceilings of classic CS or UT or quake. I miss believable sandboxes i spent days in. I miss myself enjoying all the little details games threw at me. Not much of that going on now.Same with this game. Get money then get even more. Throw the words at you so you stay for a bit longer. Spend some more having expectations. So far it works wonder if it ever won't.I like how competitive shooters always want balance included. And it usually works by just oversaturating the game with guns or some t nerfs or other lame design choices that smell of laziness.But you will always have some loot crates be sure of that.I just wonder how bad can products get in the future with trends like that.Still waiting for bullet penetration? Proper anticheat? Target practice? FPP servers in your vicinity? Ranking system? Actually dynamic vaulting? Hitreg optimizations? More FPS? After 1.0? U mad???
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: I have a love hate relationship with this game. I've won about 15 games over my time of playing PUBG and I gotta say theres alot wrong with it and alot great with it. CONS the circle of death stupid wayyy too RNG heavy in a skill based game can get lucky with it and auto winred zone stupid almost no threat have only died once to it bullet mechanics mediocre alot of "HOW THE F*$# DID HE HIT THAT SHOT?!"Vehicles greenlight indie game level driving 2/10 especially with motorcyclesMelee combat realllllyyyy dummbbbbb you can basically remove melee weapons and just hope the PUBG gods smile upon you you can either never hit a single punch/slash point blank or you one shot somebody getting lucky superman punching themMisc Absurd RNG sh!t you can either get lucky with the circle of death or you might not and when you don't suddenly theres not a single vehicle on your half of the island even though theres typically 80 spawns in that area or perhaps you drop in one garage someone drops in an adjacent garage they get full lvl 2 gear and an M4 you get a revolver and a gas can.Bugs. It doesn't require a whole lot of explaination theres alot of bugs its dumb whatever. PROS Looting is incredibly satisfying when you get lucky with your areas it fun to get fully kitted and absolutely merc anyone who comes in your wayBullet mechanics I know this was also a con but honestly it can be just as satisfying as it can be stupid sniping requires some skill theres bullet drop zeroing and guns aren't just lasers but that doesn't excuse when sometimes a point blank shotgun shot to the head won't down somebody but when it happens to you you get blown back into another time period.Combat Overall combat can be alot of fun its alot of skill and requires alot of attention and when you win a firefight the rush of adrenaline can be great. You have to be able to predict what your enemy is thinking know where they could be hiding and keep in mind everything in your surrounding like "do I have the ability to loot this body out in the open" "where could somebody be able to see me know" "where are those shots coming from" etc.Overall 87/100 As much as it seems theres alot of cons once you start playing the pros outweigh them
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Marred with various issues mainly pertaining to connection and cheaters. The Chinese desperately need to be regionlocked due to their poor connection to other worldwide servers and the painful language barrier. It doesn't make auto matchmaking fun anymore. This is also exacerbated by Brendan Greene the creator of the game. He blames the community for xenophobia when we just want to have a fun game not filled by cheaters or hitreg issues. Furthermore the Chinese players were advertised a third party VPN for the game (which is illegal in China so it is probably going to get banned) which worsens connection and compounds already existing connection issues.Fun game sometimes with decent mechanics but right now I just cannot recommend it.

review: I have 550 hours in this game. This game has so much potential and even through everything I've still played and will probably keep playing but this is an extremely game. It started out so well with almost no desync or hackers but it has quickly spiraled into Nearly every game i'll get behind cover while being shot and then be killed while behind cover. The amount of desync is this game makes it unplayable and the occasional hacker that snipes me from 1k meters doesnt help either. I wish I could make myself stop playing until the problems are fixed but it seems they will never be.

review: UPDATE Just play fortnite lol its way better nowI was initially hesitant to get this game being very scared that it was just another early access horror story. However at the time of writing this review my experience has been pretty positive.The gameplay was never what I was worried about not liking. It seemed like a nice blend of tense but also straight up fun gameplay. This is the case... for the most part. You see I think there is a very specific way you have to play PUBG not competitively. Don't look up guides on how to win. Don't try and learn different strategies. I believe these things will ruin your experience as they have with numerous other shooters for me before. Once you start to learn these "tips and tricks" every encounter becomes very formulaic. You follow an algorithm in your brain that tells you exactly what to do in any given situation. But if you avoid this type of "how to get good content" the game is infinitely more rewarding and one of the most ingenious pieces of multiplayer game design I've seen to date. The feeling of being a noob makes each encounter with an enemy feel like a opportunity where you decide freely on how to approach the situation with so much potential for really creative takedowns. The thrill of thinking on your feet is so exciting at least far more so than following the checklist that some YouTuber told you to go through every time you see an enemy.Now onto the bad Optimisation is mediocre right now. At low settings the game doesn't look that great at all but yet I still get poor frames in dense city areas. I believe optimisation should be the number one priority right now (although I am admittedly biased given that I have a fairly weak rig but even so with the low graphical fidelity this game has at lower settings I should be able to run it just fine).Microtransations while not an issue at the moment could become a problem. There are RNG loot boxes in the game for cosmetic items (which can be bought using in game "battle points "for an incrementally increasing price each time you guy one or using real money on the steam marketplace) and while 2/3 of them are free to open as of writing there was a gamescom crate released for which you had to spend real money to open. I understand it may not be in the financial interests of the company to refrain from using this kind of microtransactions but they sure would gain an enourmous amount of respect in (and also outside of) thier giant community. While I do believe that this RNG loot box system is a negative thing in the games industy it can be used to your advantage. You see the steam market integration means that you can sell the crates you earn for steam wallet money thus meaning that TECHNICALLY this game can pay for itself on a long enough timeline. I have no intention of opening any of the crates I earn and fully intend on grinding as much of the money that I paid for this game with over time. On a related note I do ask that the developers don't add ridiculous demon skulls and stupid looking holiday themed cosmetics to the game like H1Z1 has. They are tacky and really ruin the great atmosphere that this game has by making all the characters look really silly.Overall I'd say that this game is pretty great with some rough around the edges but nothing that ruins the core gameplay experience (which really is excellent).

review: This game when people play it honestly is a ton of fun. Even more fun when you have a good group of friends to play with. However the cheating that has been occuring (aimbot shooting through walls etc) can make the game unbearable. So for now I'm not recommending the game due to that. Once the developers clean that up however it happens I'll be happy to recommend it again. As far as glitches I haven't experienced a whole lot so I don't have that to complain about but others have.*Edit* So I'm not all that good at the game but I usually get 3 4 kills so I'm not all that bad and recently haven't had a whole lot issue with cheaters. I say to noticeable improvement that I would recommend the game. It is still a ton of fun and good adrenaline rush. Enjoy!

review: 1.) The amount of reviews of hackers would have you believe it's unplayable. If there were actually hackers in every match I wouldn't win any games but I do. It's mostly very skilled players and the base of this game can't get around that people are better than them at an FPS. The death repcap system is so it will appear that people don't have their crosshair on you. This has been a problem since the beginning when you would spectate teammates.2.) I can only vouch for NA but China invading NA servers was months ago and they no longer jump into NA lobbies with their immesive lag.3.) Optimization is trash. I have a i5 4690k GTX 750 Ti PCiE 16GB Ram and still have to play on low with occasional lag screens during the beginning of games. It has improved much since but be warned it will still have console graphics unless you have an i7/Ryzen 7 and a beastly GPU.4.) I still don't recommend this game. Give it 2 years.

review: Just going to say I have never won a single game of PlayerUnknown's and I don't think this matters so I don't care if you say something like 'UHH BUT YOU HAVEN'T WON A GAME UGHH."I don't know how I feel about this game. I love it to death but there is something nagging at me and I can't get rid of it. So as my usual format I'm going to say the Pros and Cons. Lets begin Pros The tensity of the situation. The game can be really tense at times which may be percieved as a bad thing however I believe that as the tensity increases the games true colours shine. Getting that kill to be able to survive as the circle gets smaller and smaller and smaller It really is ingenious. The amount of loot/customisablity. This makes the game beneficial for you and those around you. Not only do you get to mix and match weapon attachments to suit your playstyle but the cosmetics it adds just brings some colour into quite a dark game(expanded on later) How fun it can be with friends. I have spent more time messing about with friends than actually playing the game itself. I guarantee you that I have more team kills than actual kills. That may seem bad but trust me it is a blast to play. This gmae is more fun with more people. 'Nuff said.Cons The LOD/L aaa g. This makes the game borderline unplayble at points. Picture this You are in a tense gunfight both of you one bullet away from riding the reapers ghost train and... you're game fails to load/lags to the point where you are looking at a frozen screen and you die. Great. Uninstalling. The tedium. This game can be so annoying. The first 20 30 games I played consisted of 2 scenarios. 1. I don't find anyone for an hour than get shot in the head by a Kar98K at the back of the map. 2. I find someone but I lag and (see point one of cons) It takes too...goddamn...LOOOONNG. Kind of like this review. I have spent 84 hours on this game of time of writing and I have only gotten into the top 5 TWICE. And it's not because I'm bad at the game. (in those games I got 7 kills both) It's because I got so bored of waiting that when action did arrive I was so tired I didn't pay attention. I hate that. I just hate it.In conclusion I still recommend this game. It's just that you have to be prepared for long grindy hours of annoyance and frustration. But they are constantly adding new content and it is a ton of fun to play with friends. My rating? 5/10
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: 这款游戏 总体来讲 可玩性很足 无论是胜利还是失败都有足够的看点 可以说这款游戏就是为直播而生 但是同样 在当前的很多游戏系统设定中 很多很好玩的东西都被这款游戏完全限制住了 赢了的局 看技术 输了的局 就当看了一部 孤岛上的一百万死法 因为目前来讲这款游戏还是抢先体验 所以有一些设定还是处于摸索状态 不过就目前来讲我发现的问题主要是集中在 武器系统太过单调 快速扩容这种双料配件就不应该存在 既然有快速扩容 为什么还要有快速和扩容 明明就是需要玩家来选的东西 结果偏要搞出一个双料 弹药量太过于充足 前期泼水 后期弹药无用 大量的主武器弹药导致了游戏中手枪和近战武器几乎可以直接删除了 没有丝毫的存在感 目前来讲设计那么多种近战武器 除了锅能用来挡枪顺便搞笑以外 其他近战武器全是摆设 而武器系统的不平衡则导致了这款游戏的根本问题 从头打到尾 能用的枪就那么几把 其他武器基本上都可以无视 一把HK416或者SCAR L直接全程通吃 可以适应任何情况 作为一款随机性如此之强的游戏 设计了几乎没有任何缺陷的武器难道就不觉得有问题 vector这把枪现在定位超级尴尬 明明是.45大口径ACP弹 伤害反而比UMP9低 而且最重要的是备弹本身就少 伤害还不够 射速又快 一梭子打出去打不死人很正常 如果我来设计这款游戏的武器系统 我觉得这样选择比较有可玩性 7.62mm阵营 SCAR H 20发备弹 定位为短管卡宾枪 SCAR H作为卡宾枪射速慢但是伤害更高 但是后座强大 远距离射击如果采用全自动方式几乎就是乱打 扩容弹夹+5 AKM 30发备弹 整体属性和目前的AK差不多 但是后坐力要比SCAR H小 远距离精度也要更好 扩容弹夹+10 5.56mm阵营 G36C 30发备弹 射速快 后座大 伤害略低于目前的SCAR L 但是无论远近精度均非常出色 易于掌控 但是远距离弹药伤害衰减极大 超过100米 只要有防弹衣伤害基本可以无视 15 25 武器授权问题可以有无数种方式规避 当然也不一定非得是G36C 只是要选择一款有特性的武器 扩容+10HK416 在目前的HK416基础上削弱射速 比AK稍高即可 扩容+10弹药系统 目前的弹药量太过于充足了 我们其实可以增加弹药的出现率 但是每一盒弹药的数量大幅度降低 目的有三 一 在极少的弹药量下 手枪和近战武器的必要性就得到了凸显 尤其是前期大家找枪很随机的情况下 即使你得到了枪 也只能让你在敌人近身之前削弱他的血量 二 可以防止交战靠泼水的情况出现 前面已经说过了 现在绝地求生这款游戏 中期就是泼水打法 弹药多到打不完 有的时候为了捡别的东西甚至要丢弃弹药 何必呢 三 可以增加我下面说的武器系统 机枪机枪系列 首先我们要做的是将M249移出空投武器列表 首先我来说一下增加机枪的原因 在弹药量受到大幅度削减的情况下 机枪可以作为一个关键时刻提供压制能力的重要武器 但是注意 极少的弹药储备可能会导致一杆胡乱操作的机枪在1分钟内耗光全队伍所有的弹药储备 M249直接作为5.56阵营的机枪 同时7.62阵营添加M240或者是PKP Pecheneg 每一款武器都应该有自己鸡肋的地方 而不是像现在一样一把HK416或者一把SCAR L通吃全场 最后说一句 第二主武器的存在没有任何必要性 反而影响游戏体验 取消第二主武器 可以极大增加手枪的出场率 另外 M16A4的存在意义到底是啥 先不说连建模都是错的 M16A4的功能完全可以直接并入MINI 14 各种BUG 各种外挂 锁区吧

review: Edit I find the amount of VAC banned people commenting and blaming streamers makes me laugh. This game has a hacker problem in early October 2017 and they all seem to take their bans out on streamers. The game is good hackers are not everyone wishes the servers/gameplay would be a bit more optimized but they have worked hard and everything has been steadily optimized over time so bear with take everything you read with a grain of salt.I first heard about this game due to streams on Twitch. The gameplay was so enjoyable to watch. It was the perfect balance of intense moments and slow moments for people to interact.Enjoying these streams is what lead me to purchase this game and my god I have been hooked.First of all let's get the elephant out of the room this game is in early access so is by no way finished. The biggest issues are optimization and server desync which make it difficult when things get heated...sometimes the better frame rate wins sometimes the server desyncs and it feels like you get hit when you're behind cover. HOWEVER there does feel like there are ways you can play around these things based on your strategic gameplay and your map knowledge which is really cool.Having said that though I have not had this much fun playing a game ever. There are a myriad ways to play a really high skill cap every match feels completely different even if you do everything exactly the same from the previous and the multiplayer allows for plenty of laughs and hyped moments all at the same time.I highly recommend this to anyone looking to enjoy themselves be it solo or with a group of friends. My favorite way to play is Queuing solo into squads with auto matching as you can meet a lot of new people and find out completely new strats you never thought of! Having a mic helps a ton though!I hope you try it and love it as much as I have!

review: Is Pubg really worth your money well it is a very interesting topic.It has many ups and downs so lets start with the good parts....Pros Pretty well optimized for early access. Very nicely decorated interiors of buildings. Very good graphics on high and ultra. Low amounts of server lag. Wide selection of weapons and clothing. Overall nice community. Only $30! Fantastic developers!!!!! )Now for the not so good parts....Cons Only one map (more on the way though) Must have reasonably good pc to play on higher settings. Can get dull without your friends. A few different startup issues (at the moment) Gets annoying if you die early in the game and have to wait for your buddys to finish. There are real hackers right now (which is why the report button is there when you are killed)As you can see there are very good reasons for why you should or shouldnt buy pubg I will leave it up to you to decide if it is for you but in my opinoin it is a no brainer for the price point and the fun to be had with or without your friends!

review: Okay look. There are really great features in this game. I love the different guns that are available even if selection is a tad bit limited. The concept is really neat with trying to be the last man standing blah blah blah. Honestly though this game is so ridiculously broken it makes me laugh. The audio bugs out all the time sometimes making it seem like someone is running right behind you but no it's your own footsteps. And it's often very hard to tell if shots are coming from behind or in front of you. If you want realism then act like it. Fix your game. On top of that the amount of people I see using some kind of aim hack or hit scan or various other hack is ridiculous. (And yes I mean when it's very obvious) Not only is it disappointing knowing how many people use them but the fact that the developers haven't put forth any proper effort with stopping this just makes me so sad. If you want people to choose your game over other battle royale games you need to fix your game and make it much more difficult to hack.

review: First off let me say this. The people that make negative reviews saying "DONT BUY BECAUSE OF MICROTRANSACTIONS!!!" are not smart. The microtransactions dont affect the game much. They dont give an advantage whatsoever. Anyways...PUBG is a fantastic high performance battle royale game. You need a pretty hefty computer to run it. Im going to break this down to a Pros and Cons list.Pros Fun gameplayGood combat mechanicsFirst and Third person modeFun with friendsEasy to find everythingCons Very unoptimizedBuggy but it is in alpha.people getting banned for being near a streamerBy good gun mechanics i mean that combat is not about who shoots first or who has the better gun its about who is more skilled.Easy to find everything as in you can find guns in the first 10 seconds of landing easily. Their is a firearm in most buildings/houses throughout the entire map. I like that because that makes it somewhat fair.I do reccomend this game. It is very buggy and sometimes laggy and unstable but the great fun gameplay and good looking visuals easily make up for it.

review: I don't buy many games partially because I'm close to broke but also because with many games I don't feel like I would get my money's worth. The 30EUR I spent on this game was the best investment I've made on Steam by far. Countless hours of entertainment regardless of the fact that I kind of suck at FPS games and have a potato PC (playing at around 20 30FPS *sad face* ). Even though the game is still in Early Access I find it being a pretty good game and the dev team is working hard to make it even better.Many people left negative reviews because they included microtransactions in the game.. I can understand the fact that many people don't want them but I don't consider that being a strong reason to leave a bad review for a game you've probably played hundreds of hours of and still continue to play it. All in all I'm glad to be a part of the people who supported this game in Early Access and looking forward to see what the future will bring.

review: Five Star Game Absolutely garbage game. Terrible desync that will leave you dying 3 seconds after you've taken cover around a corner from someone. Hackers are rampit in the new map and will ruin even your most looted games. If you don't have a decent CPU or GPU (GTX 960M or abover) your in game destiny will be totally and completely up to your teammates who will have to protect your non moving body while you inevitably have trouble loading into the game. All that being said it's an addicting game that will leave you mindlessly playing (and screaming at your monitor). One of the best games i've played. Death to fortnite.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: good game overall. You dont need a NASA computer. I run it with an I 5 2400 3.10GHz 8GB RAM and an nvidia gt 1030. Runs great on medium settings. THe game does need optimization at times and can be glitchy. Not game breaking though. There are a ton of chinese in the 3rd person squad games. But I havent seen a hacker yet. Foreigners can be good and bad. Had a great team full of guys that didnt know a lick of english. But were good team mates none the less. Ive also had a team that after they had 10 seconds to go before the barrier moved I drove halfway across the map to pick them up and they ended up betraying me and shooting me. I also had a crazy ride on a motorcycle trying to get away from a bomb zone. The game is intense and there are many playstyles to employ. All in all the hype is real. You get because you get merced but you keep coming back. 9/10All in all i would optimize the game more and add more weapons like remote bombs .50 barrett bear traps flying vehicles and maybe finding a special remote that lets the player pick the next bombing zone. More maps would be a plus.

One downside is there is a ton on updates but in a way it means that things are being improved on. ***One very bad thing though was that shooting is off. When killing people and shooting at each other I noticed only one can die. I shot two people in one game with a crossbow instant death. I then shot a third and he killed me but he had a bolt sticking out of his neck/head with only a gas mask on. Kill cam showed no damage to him whatsoever. It was from easy 20 yards and a kill. ***The above does need to change other than that decent game.

review: The game overall is a 6.5/10 which is not passing in my terms PUBG has a certain unpolished feeling to it like the developers just put the released logo on it to make it look like its done but I assure you it's not.PERFORMANCE Abysmal a recent driver for my GTX 1060 said that it would keep it at 60 fps but it can drop down to 25 30 fps. This is unacceptable in a game that is competitive. GAME PLAY Looooooooooong durations of running looting getting shot at where you dont even know fishy plays by some of these people.NETWORKING Lag lag and more lag. Im not sure if the people who unirronically say "China numbah one!" are actually from China but it sure damn feels like it.TL DRDecent game with its issues fun with a friend boring/stressful alone.EDIT With recent updates and the games release it helped with the technical problems listed above. I'd give it a 7.5/10

review: I've only played one solo game on this and thoroughly enjoyed it. The real jewel with this game is playing with 1 3 friends I haven't had as much fun on a multiplayer game since the (me and my friends) glory days of R6V &amp CoD4. Sure there are issues but the devs are quick to address them and are very much in communication with their fan base on the twitters. You won't always have a fun game bad things will happen and you may not be certain of the cause these issues have decreased over time though and this is what we should expect from an EA game. The fun games though.... WOW! So many varied and fun gunfights so many funny random moments the adrenaline and satisfaction of winning a game the sense of failure and regret from coming 2nd....I've nearly 130 hours on the game at the time of writing and far from being bored some people think it is slightly expensive for an EA title but in terms of value for the playtime you'll get it's incredibly cheap! One of the big draws for me to purchase early was the promise of mod support upon release where the potential is massive. Optimisations will come zombie mods will come wasteland mods will come new maps will come (btw the standard map is one of THE best maps I've ever played).I'm totally hyped for Sacriel's upcoming game but that's some way off and I think I'll happily be playing both of them when they both have had their full release. In the meantime I can play this now and have a great deal of fun.9/10
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Let me just start off by saying this game USED to be exciting. As the first "Battle Royale" game I ever really came in contact with I had a great time playing. All my buddies huddled around TV screen the suspensfulness of a top 5 scenario. It was great. Let me tell you that I have never hated a game more than how much I now hate PUBG. If fortnite were first person I'd switch in a heartbeat. PUBG has become the glitchiest buggiest unfair hacker ridden POS game I have EVER played. I am not just saying that because I just spent the better part of half an hour collecting gear weapons and meds fighting all the way to a top 10 just to have my bike flip over an obstacle that was LITERALLY NOT EVEN THERE. If you're looking for a game that will make you want to pull out every one of your hairs one by one then look no further. If youre looking for a game the dangles enticing game modes in front of your nose to have them glitch the F**** out and disapear a few days later then look no further. Most importantly If youre looking for a game who's developers only give a about making money and not give a single f**** about the player or the players experience then look no further. I'm not some angry little kid writing a review I've been playing this game since it first came out. I've been playing this game since it was just a mod for Day Z. It's trash through and through.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Product received for free. This is everything I wanted with dayz and Arma. I have had so many fantastic and intense moments already. They need to beef up their servers optimize alot of things and make sure you can't shoot people once they have moved behind walls. Once they fix the issues with the game it will be the perfection of the tactical survival shooter genreUpdate Nevermind they fixed some issues and there is some optimization but this long after the release people can still shoot you after you get behind walls they dumbed down and messed up all of the shooting mechanics that were really good in early access and with some mediocre attempts at stopping the hacking there are still issues with that. Not server locking players was a serious issue. They needed to put more time into fixing the core game than doing cash grabs with crates and kept the shooting mechanics how they were. The game can still be fun but is definitely a bullet sponge game now and is alot less fun most of the time.

review: Don't listen to these whining about microtransactions. They're clothing items completely irrelevant to any gameplay. You can not buy an advantage in this game which is the REAL downside of microtransactions. You will read reviews complaining saying that the crate system is akin to gambling (I agree) but if you don't want to gamble THEN DON'T GAMBLE. You can get a ton of cosmetic items (many of which are very similar to those in the crates you can open with the paid keys just by playing the game. At the time of this review there are two kinds of crates you can get free one you cannot. I understand wariness about microtransactions but if you're like me and your concern is how they actually effect gameplay then rest assured that there is no impact. As for the game itself it's great. You will encounter the typical early access bugs but the devs are very active and engaged with the community. This is not a cashgrab as other reviewers might have you think. This is a game with solid core gameplay constant free updates and a bright future in store.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: 7 June 2018 We as South African players are forced to play on EU servers as the developers always ignore our requests for local servers. There is a huge gaming community in this country. And BTW our 200ms ping does not give us any form of unfair advantage. I got killed plenty! All of my friends hate cheaters and we game because we love it! So sad that we're excluded from the "first world countries". There are world class gamers here in SA. PLEASE DEVELOPERS JUST ONE SOUTH AFRICAN SERVER!!! Great game though!!!13 March 2018 Sadly South African players are yet again not taken into consideration even though a HUGE gaming commuity exists in this country. PLEASE ADD A SOUTH AFRICAN SERVER!!! Developers will certainly benefit financially from this as their are hardly any games (especially Battle Royal type) that have SA servers. Do some research developers and you'll notice that SA based players have enormous numbers playing other games that accomodate them and they're very keen on PUBG but are holding out because their PING is 200+. Come on developers make a gaming community happy! We'll even lure some of those incompetent cheaters from other servers if it makes you happy!Awesome game bad support for those that could actual thrive from better latency. Will give positive rating if this happens. I know of many gamers that i'll encourange to do the same IF we get assistance!

review: At this point with the current state of the game I cannot recommend PUBG to anyone. I have played the game for over a year and it feels like the game has more issues then when I first start played.Pros 1. 4 man squad tactics 2. Diverse gun selection and3. Extreme satisfaction from winning.Cons 1. Serve stability 2. D sync 3. Matchmaking (broken ranking system) 4. Character animations 5. Vaulting mechanic 6. Gun balancing 7. In game loot distribution 8. Lobby UI 9. Out of game loot/crate system 10. Toxic game culture 11. Reporting mechanism (not transparent or effective) 12. Explosions 13. Replay and spectate issues 14. Graphics optimization 15. Game/lobby crash 16. In game sound and17. Prioritization of cash over content.The present state of the game needs a total ground up rework and revitalization with a heavy focus on optimization. I have enjoyed my time with this game and the joy/frustration it brough me and my friends. However with so many other options available (Black ops Fortnite Ring of Elisum Fear the Wolves....) I doubt I will continue to play this game any further.

Until now there s been no official response from developer PUBG Corp. even if the studio has taken steps to improve the experience.Creator Brendan PlayerUnknown Greene like the rest of his team reads these comments but he says the solution is not to lock players to their closest servers.

review: This game started as a good idea. I had a lot of fun in the initial weeks of the game. As time has gone on they've hidden more and more content behind paywall after paywall. Advancements and rewards for just playing the game are hidden behind the season pass. I already bought the game and they expect more money to unlock the incentives to put extra time into the game. I don't want to play the game very much anymore and if anything this incentivizes against playing as I feel like I'm wasting time without the season pass.Every new update pushes more content behind paywalls.There's not very many weapons in the game which is the main source of varried gameplay. In addition there are "best" weapons. You are always working towards the "best" loadouts because keeping something else tends to lead to a loss. The final circle is typically all people who got the best or close to the best builds.If you like highly competitive battle royals with very little room for fooling around mistakes or enjoyment this is the game for you. Chicken dinners are very satisfying. The rest of the game is very frustrating.It's also been very buggy recently especially in netcode areas.

review: If anything the game has very much improved since its release. People will bash it for cheaters but I've never seen one in my entire time playing. I certainly prefer it over Fortnite probably because of my experience in ArmA games. I don't understand why it has to be an argument and why the games cannot coexist. People quit bashing on H1Z1 so they could bash PUBG. Now as for a review the game features two maps a desert map and a map filled with various forms of terrain. I do not enjoy the desert map because of the enviornment. I don't know what it is sand and sun just doesn't mix well with me. I do wish there was an option to choose but I understand why there isn't. They don't want one map populated and one not. Now as for weapons there are many within the game. I think the variety is great and they continue to add weapons that do not harm the game's style. As for looting there are many areas with good loot and if you have half a brain you can fight it out in those areas to win that loot. Air crates are very common but the demand is high so you will encounter fights for aircrates. As for loot within those air crates a lot of the time it will be a Groza which is good don't get me wrong but I do think the loot tables for air crates need to be changed. Vehicles are only still somewhat useful they can get you to playzone and also get you killed. There are little microtransactions and the game is in a good state for the devs to start rolling those out. The biggest problem I have with it is the game time. It can take up to 40 minutes to finish one match. This is due to the map's size and the time playzones take to shrink. If they lower the time on circle shrinks then more people will die resulting in a shorter match. Overall in its current state I give it a 7/10. It has its issues but is closing in on a state where there can be no improvements because that's just the way it is.

review: Break out your big rig to play this game with all the bells and whistles. The cryogen engine is superb but still has not reached it's peak as you PUB utilizes the beast to offer a very challenging game.You are dropped into a battleground against 100 other players who scramble to find gear and weapons. As the knifing small arms and shotguns rip flesh without armor the semi autos build amoungst the lucky. Every building every hillside every vehicle might have a surprise for you. Be it lethal wounds or lucky loot you will not find a moment to breathe.The game's timer pulls survivors unkown to focus zones where all players must hustle to get there. These zones are both for attacking other players and avoiding a built in damage modifier to your character if you fail to reach killing zones.My only thought beyond the obvious is aiming seems a bit clunky add recoil and you might miss an unknown player less than six feet away. Realism? I belive it is over done.Good times ahead!

review: So many bugs and hackers that honestly completely ruin the game. The concept is great but the bugs and hackers just make it so even if you have someone down dead to rights the game can screw you over and get you killed. And no I'm not bad these bugs don't happen extremely often but they happen enough for me to give this game a thumbs down. Fix these bugs for the love of god. Please PING LOCK CHINA.Edit 2 months later still no ping lock. But more importantly this game is a broken ing mess and literally seems like an early access torm that was thrown together by a ing greedy trying to milk as much money as humanly possible off of the hype. There are so many gamebreaking bugs (hit detection issues hackers not being able to use health items items floating hitboxes broken getting stuck on seemingly nothing invisible barriers etc) and the devs would rather release new lootboxes that only promotes the hackers and stupid t that goes with them instead of fixing those issues. I sincerely hope PlayerUnknown or whatever the that worthless piece of s actual name is gets some serious karma.

review: Best game available today. I've played 408 hours currently and another 50 hours on the test servers. This game is just too good. I highly recommend grabbing a squad of friends and trying to progress on the leaderboards. This negative reviews are accurate however the game literally over balances them. There are occasionally hackers there are glitchy deaths and there are lag spikes in the beginning of the game but this game is still the best on the market right now. The gameplay and the necessity to survive literally still gets your heart racing when its just you vs another squad or two fighting for the top prize... the chicken dinner. There is no better feeling than erasing another squad from the game and no better feeling than putting on an amazing play in front of your buddies who hype you up after getting a disgusting 3 piece on some scrubs who thought they were smart trying to push you. This game is amazing. Come try it out so I have some people to kill. )

review: PUBG is a good but flawed game. On the plus side Erangel (first map) is great there are plenty of weapon mods the item spawning is fairly good driving is smooth there are plenty of good mechanics such as vaulting prone peek left and right etc. But with these come with a plethera of issues namely the hit registration. Often you will shoot players and the shots won't register. Other issues include lag in early game due to low tick rate a massive amount of cheaters (over 90% of which are from China the new map is godawful there are many bugs and instead of fixing these bugs working on the new map fixing the hitreg or region locking China the devs decide to add weapon skins. I love and hate this game. The devs honestly don't sem to care. They just polish it and call it a day.

title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: This is a Battle Royale game (Last man standing type of deal) you play as a custom made random character who is dropped into a large explorable world in order to fight to the death and be the Battle Royale king. You loot you fight (But mostly loot)Changed my review to not recommened as their Anti Cheat system is horid came back to play this game after a brief long break and couldn't believe how much it felt like the Beta when hackers were huge was killed by a hacker 8 times (yes I counted) only 4 of which were banned and yes I am 100% positive they were hacking.Pros World The world is very large an 8 x 8 square km island set somewhere in the Pacific or Indian ocean (Most likely the Indian ocean close to Ukraine) It offers many different variations of gameplay. From tightly packed towns to wide open fields. With things like rivers and bridges inbetween everything. It doesn't lack variety at all and still being the only map it is still fun to play on it daily.Variety The variety in this current game is large (even though there is only 1 map) What im talking about here is the amount of different playable play styles. There is so many weopons to suit your needs. From a tommy gun or a shotgun for closer quaters combat. To a m24 sniper rifle for longer range combat. And funner things inbetween. The game is set in a way that forces you to pick an playstyle as you progress depending on where the ring moves in. Fun The game offers constant fun because most of the game is random. Where the plane spawns and the plane flight path is random the loot drops are random the air drops are random and of course The ring is random. Meaning even though with the same map over and over it offers fun every single match due to it being different every single game. Cons Bugs The game does fall victim to many game altering bugs these bugs can get you killed or give your oppenents an advantage on you (which will still get you killed) Of course the game is still early access so you can't expect much on the bug side to be fixed already but it does need to be addressed.Optimization This game is obviously on the Unreal engine 4 which means on terms of Optimization not much falls directly to Blue hole developers and more onto the Unreal developers but when my computer can run dyling light on Ultra settings without vsync at a stable 60 70FPS but can't run Battle grounds on meduim at a solid 60fps (Drops to 45 occasionaly) Then that does say something about the optimization that is needed (yes I do understand they work with different engines and coding indices it's just an example)ConclusionAll things considered this game is my Favourite game of the year I orignally played Dota to fulfill my needs then switched to overwatch and now switched to PUBG (although I still play the others) It is a fun game that I highly recommend to lovers of Battle Shooters. (Only if you have a beastly or Moderatly Beastly PC) I give Pubg 8/10 based of the only 2 points lost because of bugs.Accidently ReviewedWas this review helpful or maybe even not helpful? Either way join this group for more. Free Keys and Reviews weekly!. Steam Group AccidentlyReviewed

review: Having 400+ hrs in this game means I'm not tottaly crazy about this game but I have a decent opinion about it. Personally I don't agree with the ones who compare it to Fortnite. Even if it's still a BR game Fortnite has a more arcade ish feeling to it whether you like to admit it or not. PUBG on the other hand is more realistical (not completely) and you get to put much more effort into playing it. I enjoy it a lot even though it has some major issues like Constant lack of working anti cheat (the servers aren't full of hackers as some say but there are enough of them). Servers aren't always working at full potential which means you have to refresh UI everytime you disconnect from a game and after new updates is common for them not to work at all. Vehicles are pretty messed up especially motorcycles ( 3 seaters too) and I think they should try to fix the interactions between minor objects such as poles or lights because you can stack the vehicle in them and they would take continuos damage which leads to the vehicle exploding and you dying (this type of death also brings a lot of rage and usage of alt f4) About minor problems there are things like Visual bugs where you see weapons combined or can't aim if someone's proned behind you Dying immediately if you exit a boat even if it doesn't touch you Taking lots of falling damage if your parachute messes up in some kind of building I think these were all the cons to it but it would take a lot to tell you the pros about it and even if this game has some problems the fact that the developers listen to user feedback makes PUBG one of the best games out there. 100% reccomended it to all my friends.

The graphics on the other hand kill your computer I can run this game on MED HIGH on a GTX 1060 it is not optimized very well which I think the devolpers will change that soon so more consumers would come and play. review: Very good game improved loads with update and runs so smoothly. The MASSIVE problem lies with the servers the initial 'elastic band' lag can be severe at the start and can be very annoying ending in a b******t death and lots of salt. But that goes quickly and won't be too bad if you don't land in a large area or with a lot of people. The problem that ruins the game is not being able to load a game. It varies based on time and sever but I can often not load into a game (recieving the 'Connection Lost') for 5 10 tries or more. This is how I usually end a session getting annoyed I've wasted more time on the hub screen than playing the game. Overall a beautiful game but they need to improve servers. One big worry is there are 2 maps (both very fun and different styles) right now it is a random choice selection so there are 6 game modes (Solo duo squad x2 due to Third person and First person). But due to popular demand Bluehole will be changing it in January so people can select the map they want. They have acknowledged that this will make finding a game harder as there will effectively be 12 games modes now. So the future of this game relies on servers and the company working out how to increase the chances of getting a game for now I recommend the game but just be prepared for frustration.

review: Walking then driving simulator with guns and helmets. Round One. Lands at a Farm out in the sticks. Its the mansion. Its not out in the sticks. Its not a farm. There are many people here. Finds rubbish (or no) guns. Finds ten's of people in the neighbouring buildings dies in a pan fight over a pistol. Let's go again.Round Two. Lands in the city.Finds amazing guns addon's equipment has more medical supplies than the local hospital more ammo than the average Texan and zoom lenses to rival the hubble space telescope. Manages to escape and avoid everyone. Wanders the hills alone. Gets headshotted by a man with a KAR98 standing behind a rock 3 miles away. Didn't even hear the bullet. Back to the menu let's have another round!!! Round Three. Lands at a shack.Finds a pistol. Kills three guys. Today's my day. None of them had loot. Bugger. Found a Car HURRAY!Dies in a car explosion after sitting a pebble.ANOTHER ROUND HERE WE COME.Still haven't had a chicken dinner but that's because I'm not very good at this game.

review: My first short Review!After appr. 100 hours of gameplay i reached the bottom of midskill rank and think i can give a small review especially after so many bad reviews for the game lately.At the beginning its a very hard game for noobs.. rounds and rounds all you do is more or less fast dying. This can be frustrating for some people but others might take it as a challenge.After some hours it gets better and when you got you first 4 people kill streak the motivation to get better and find out more details of the game is very high.I played appr. 100 hours till now and im still very excited to play it.Playing as duo/squads brings much fun too. The developers are always busy to bring out new content. The cheater many people mentioned here i cant confirm. The only thing that happened to me sometimes were some kind of bot players who automatically went to houses got gear and wait there till they get killed. But i guess no aimbots or something though the deathcam is still a bit inaccurate. PUBG is actually at least trying to do something against the cheating problem.The gameplay physics and sounds are quite nice &amp realistic so the immersion of the game is very pronounced.Graphics could be better.All in all i can recommend this game totaly.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Pros Its worth the money. I'm glad I bought it. Choose first person or third person for added view. You can run straight into action or stay on the outskirts and wait until the very end if you go unseen. Hiding inside the houses and listening for other players footsteps has an almost Resident Evil horror game tone especially if they have a gun and you dont yet. If you die the next game starts in about 60 seconds or you can spectate your remaining team or the person that killed you.Buy this game if you like Sniping Stealth Driving Vehicles Looting Moding Weapons Needs Fixed It does have many bugs they need to fix though such as servers busy black screen sound cutting out etc. Globally everyone plays the North American server for some reason so expect to meet people on your team that might not speak English and have high ping. The overall graphics could be a little better. They need a night mode more levels (maybe with civilians) a little bit better fluidity of motion in the graphics like falling jumping etc they are also missing an easy way to "add friends" when playing with new people text chat and in game leaderboards showing my current kill count which hopefully will come in updates shortly.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS
