review: Fun but highly unbalanced. Whoever gets an assault rifle first is basically guaranteed to kill anyone around him you might as well restart if you don't. Maps are also far too large for how fast the area shrinks. I spend 95% of my time running to the new play areas this isn't exactly battle royale.Do I recommend it? Only if you can manage a get an assault rifle within 20 seconds of your drop every time.To sum up Too few weapons too few modes of transport for this game the way it is. It wouldn't be so bad if you didn't have to wait 2 minutes every time you die to rejoin the action especially when the lobbies are filled in seconds.Still somehow addicting in the few instances you don't get killed 20 seconds in or die running in a bee line for the center. Should have called it Player Unkown's Wait Lobby...Some o0f the controls do not work for no explicablke reason such as the inability to zoom with scopes no matter what keys youi have it set to.

review: I have a strong love hate relationship when it comes to this game. One day I'll have multiple 5+ kill games and win a couple dinners and the next I'll be dying before I see people and never even get a shot off half the time. I really hope this game fixes its server issues and opens up a NA west server because getting 100+ ping in the midwest is aids. Despite its faults though no game has ever brought me as much enjoyment and thrill as this game. That's pretty much the only reason why I'm willing to give this a recommendation.If Bluehole gets their act together and really improves this game I'll probably go full fanboy again. If they fail to do so I'll probably jump ship with Blackout and only play this when major updates come around. I wish this game had fallen into the hands of more competent developers but beggers can't be choosers I guess. I've tried most of the other Battle Royale games (Fortnite IoN RoE Realm Royale H1Z1) and none of them even compare to PUBG for me. I do realize Fortnite is the better game but I just can't get into it. I really hope Bluehole can do something to seriously impress me and make me fall in love with this game again but maybe I'm holding onto a thread of hope. I will always recommend this game though because its like that crazy ex that gives the best head. No matter what I'll always want to go back and scratch that itch.UPDATE 10/23/18 I'm a man of my word and I said if they fixed update 22s lobby connection issues I would change my review back to positive. That being said I am still on a Blackout binge and I probably won't be playing this again until they make some big updates. Love the game and always will but I have a shiny new toy. Also the halloween skins are a rip off /.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Well its good enough just and involved enough to stay interesting for now. Average PC peformance at best it will struggle on many PC's and laptops but is MUCH better after the latest driver release from NVIDIA. Stll a glitchy little bugger at times but decent graphics and good if long winded gameplay. Collect hide stalk get shot from behind. Many complain about hackers but to be honest I havent been able to notice the huge numbers of them yet. But they are definately there.Aiming and the interface is a little clunky and aiming down sights feels as wooly as a battlefeild game. Very realistic bullet mechanics I must say and no real way of intuitively predicting without practice. Difficult to master a long shot or even close range at times. Despite its flaws it just about passes not going back for refund so sticking with it for a while. No easy way of finding a clan or team but going through "discord" can work.Lack of content is the main issue no chance of having a jungle map in the future I suspect as it would probably even melt the met office computer.One thing I will say is that the game is pretty much got a massive flaw from the start. A reduced map area over time is still open to abuse and poor goodwill among players. It also means that by the time the map is reduced to a small area of effect there are maybe 10 20 players left. This provides an impetus for even the most avid camper and can also give advantage to people who are more aggressive and can aim better (or teams). So whilst a good idea there probably should have been a better strategy of forcing gamers to move there camping asses. Like UAV's etc would have been a better idea. Also the crate system is pure
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: I am here about to delete my PUBG and figured I would write a fair review before I do so. 850+ Hours in this gameLoved the realistic type graphics and the general idea of gameplay for a Battle Royal. But there are more bugs in the game than well written code. Months and months ago BlueHole was updating and creating hot fixes for little bugs every week or so. Over time these became more and more delayed along with ignoring game breaking bugs and cheats. When Fortnite started to pick up pace PUBG started to copy the little things instead of FULLY completing their product. THEY DIDNT EVEN DO THIS BEFORE THE OFFICIAL RELEASE. I have endless clips of bugs and game breaking elements that I sent in. None were ever addressed nor do I think they want to put the hours into fixing the game. s new focus Emotes Skins more bs microtransactions (WE PAYED FOR THE GAME BY THE WAY PLEASE FIX IT) Stopped consistent hot fixes Stopped consistent large bug fixing patches no innovation/creativity behind game The one thing that changed while playing over the months was a vaulting system that was questionable (but good direction) addition of new weapons (not enough if you ask me) and a super NEW (some people love it to be fair) map. (2nd map introduced) I had lots of fun at first but playing a broken game and being promised it would be better for months on end becomes very annoying. Your friends make the game anyways so take them and play a better game! Just play fortnite for a battle royal and if you want a more realistic element look into games like Rainbow Six Siege. But PUBG will just take your money and time. 1/10 RATING FOR A LONG PERIOD OF TIME OWNING6/10 If I only played it for 1/10 of the time.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: TLDR Had a great time exactly game I wanted at first. Sliding quality has led me to recommend potential buyers to HOLD in the meantime until PUBG can return to the postive experience.Playing in early access and throughout it's life I can say that I have truely enjoyed myself the highstakes competition and euphoria of that "chicken dinner." The Battlegrounds dev team and Playerunkown himself have put a lot of love and inguinuity into PUBG its alpha beta and release not in the least as the first real attempt at releasing a standalone battle royale game (starting as an ARMA mod of course!). The devs have the right idea with new locations new guns new attachments better auto controls.HOWEVER followed by a big BUT. I am writing this as a negative recommendation due to the deteriorating quality of gameplay compared to development time the whole experience has significantly faultered in quality of late. Several massive issue (not including the whole cheaters mess) have slowly grown to what I can call an elephant in this every crowding room sync issues confusing Menu and UI microtransactions and bait n switch item tactics show me that the dev team has not put true heart into what should be considered a battle royale crown jewel. Metaphorically you do not use spit and sandpaper to clean a 100 carat dimond.The deteriorating quality of gameplay is a bit of a hearbreak. I emplore the dev team to find new motivation learn from growing critisism abandon their eagerness for post sale monetization and build the game back to the grand battle royal experience. In the meantime I would tell fellow gamers to hold their money and invest elsewhere.PS graphic improvements wouldnt hurt either.

review: PUBG is a worthless ripoff of battle royale(a japanese movie) with really bad driving or gun mechanics created by Brendan Greene. Anti cheat system is more like "f.c.u.k. you a i am a GM and i can and will ban you for nothing). there is 2 senerios in game either jump to a crowded location and work your way up there or work to a god forsaken place and work your way up there. By saying"work your way up" i mean if u are in safe area hide like a p.u.s.s.y.(soem call them campers but this phrase is much better) and try to kill others or try to move to safe area hoping other p.u.s.s.i.e.s won't see you and shoot you. Shoting is a nother think7 there are some selection in guns but you never get to practice with them so you need to get better by luck. Get a gun and hope your shooting technique works. Only 2 kind of person should by this game. 1) a game streamer who tries to find some followers or ones that have awfull taste in games. It hardly deserves to be played "free" so don't waste your money on it.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Bluehole did nothing for their western customer base. With the exception of making promises they did not deliver on in order to get us to fund this project for launch. Then they released it to the chinese. Who have stepped into the market to literally destroy it.Upon voicing concerns about the cheating and overall bad player behavior coming from the asian market. We the customers who paid to establish this product were told we were racists xenophobes and that we needed to ing grow up.In over a year since the games official release there are still game destroying glitches on the first map that anybody who knows about them can exploit. For almost a year. THIS GAME WAS ONLY THAT ONE MAP! We reported bugs were ignored spoke out about it and were banned from blueholes forums. We took to steam and they abandoned the forums on steam all together. They have released tons of paid content! They have made over 3.4 billion since the release in january. No talk of a new game no talk of establishing better servers etc. I'm done.The lag and desynch are terrible. Players with higher ping are rewarded. The player with higher ping will have the advantage of only hits registering within the first 5 seconds of the enounter. This will never be fixed. The things released in the "fixpubg" roadmap are being stated as finished but haven't been started. The cheating is terrible the game is kind of garbage. It can be addictive for some reason. Even that is going to hell now. The community is like an aol chat room lol. With the introduction of leauges we have seen new mistreatment of players not aligned in leauges. Teamkillers from leauges taking people out because they're not in the group outside of game.The game has basically killed itself. They have lost over 2.5 million regular players in 10 months... I would only recommend playing this game if they made it free to play. Otherwise download pubg mobile on your pc and play for free lol.Edit don't even play it if it's free lol.

review: Ignore the other reviews its actually a fairly good game.Playerunknown's Battlegrounds (PUBG) is a Battle Royale game where 100 players are dropped onto an 8x8 Kilometer island and have to fight to survive. It is action packed however hard to master. I first played PUBG on my Xbox a few years ago (Sure it does kinda suck on xbox) and It was interesting. It has a steep learning curve but it's Even more fun when you learn what you are doing then it is when you are a noob. The Devs don't listen much but with their new "Fix PUBG" Program they are running it is getting much better. It has 3 maps (2 being 8x8 Kilometers as i said earlier) and one being 4x4 kilometers. Even if you hear all of the negative reviews you should try it out! It is actually a fairly good game. Sure the gameplay loop can get boring if you keep on dying the second you spawn in but most of the time you don't.8.5 / 10

Reset my internet have contacted my netowrk provider to see if its an error with my connection NO LUCK as i have the best package they provide with fiberoptic broadband Verified files ans i get an error saying 1 file needs revalidating (NO LUCK!) Unistalled PUBG and erased any files and re downloaded (NO LUCK!) Checked my Norton firewall and i have PUBG on allowed on import &amp Export (NO LUCK!) Deactivated my security Norton (NO LUCK!) Checked and downloaded all drivers and there all upto date Adjusted settings on PUBG performance etc and on NVIDIA (NO LUCK!) I have browsed hours to find a forum with someone with same error. (NO LUCK!) i think you get the picture of the pain i'm suffering. I'm not one to give up on finding a solution by i have too i'm drained!.If there is genius out there computer/Game wizard please could you come up with a solution.Or if theres someone who's had the same thing i could really do with your help! review: This game used to be awesome. Even before its official release I found that the game ran considerably better and was much more fun even with the old community and bugs it had. I took a long break from the game and decided to come back to it to see how it has changed. It has turned from a great game into a horrible one. It is scattered with t crates money making schemes and they say the fix bugs and issues with the game but what I have found is that they have only made the game worse instead of optimizing it. And don't get me wrong I have more than a powerful computer to run it it just seems that it gets worse and worse as time goes by. I cant even load into the game properly anymore because of whatever reason...it just takes ages to load. I honestly wished it stayed in its older stages back before its official release. Its sad to see such a great game go down the drain.

review: I reccomend but there are multiple huge problems with PUBG.one. Fix your damn landing system. It is the shttiest out of all the battle royale games. If I land on top of radio tower at military base do not glitch out and spawn me next to it 50+ feet in the air just so i can fall to my death.two. REGION LOCK CHINA. Im sick and tired of playing random 4 man squads on the north american servers and getting stuck playing with 3 Chinese players that do not speak my language (this happens literally 90% of the time).three. Fix the hacker problem. Too many times have I been having a great game (aside from almost dying from parachuting and the fact I cannot communicate with a single one of my teammates) and then all the sudden I will get killed so I dont think much of it. I check death cam to review how I died and to my surprise or lack of one now as this happens about 1 in 15 games there is a person on the complete opposite side of the map from me and they have locked onto my character and killed me with a pump shotgun from miles away.four. Please listen to the community and fix the things that need to be fixed. We honestly dont care if you changed the energy drink texture. It makes not difference and its a waste of an update.Other than that this game is flawless. Even with these problems I can still sometimes enjoy myself but fixing these is very important to a lot of the PUBG community as fixing these problems are vital to making this game successful.6.5/10

review: **READ TO END**MY REVIEW A YEAR AGO Like Ive said in some of my other reviews I enjoy games that I keep coming back to time and time again. This game defintely falls under that category. Every match is different Every match is fun and most matches have an element of suspense too.I strongly recommend this game and I strongly suggest you get a couple friends together to play it.NOWI can sadly no longer reccomend this game to ANYONE because of literally countless bugs glitches and honestly the game is just a huge mess. It runs on a HIGHLY modified version of Unreal engine and ill tell you.. it sucks! ever since 1.0 the game has gone severely downhill the devs care only about adding useless t to spark interest in the game while overlooking every single thing that makes the game actually work.In the past year 1. the menu has gone from a clean looking and good sounding place to an utter MESS of adverisements for streamers and new useless features2. the landscape has gone from a vibrant green map to a dull almost smoggy and grey feeling one (and im talking about the same map they just found a way to make it look bad.) 3. countless bugs have arisen due to oversight of worthless devs and worst of all Brendon Greene himself.But what really bothers me is that not only is the game a dumpster fire but the devs just sit there and watch it burn and the features they add are just adding fuel to the flames. THE DEVS JUST DONT CARE but worst of all they still want $30 for their game that is currently on life support.

Yes and no. If you want to have some fun and price isnt big for you. Buy. If you wanted to try it long time ago but only was watching videos on youtube and still want this buy. review: While PUBG went into early access as a revolutionary game creating massive hype and many heart stopping moments it never really left early access. The game plays extremely poorly mostly due to what seems like lack of optimization and the faulty game engine. You need to have extremely powerful pc to be able to run this game properly and in good graphics so that you can enjoy it properly. Often those components cost too much so most people can't afford them (exp. GTX 1080 GTX 1080 Ti RX Vega... ) After that the money issue. It costs 30$ and even though that isn't expensive as other games for the game that was in early acces and badly optimize with massive multiplayer it sure is. If you want to buy the game wait until its 10$ or 15$ or possible when its free to play. Otherwise don't waste money. Cheater problem. Really soon after the game was released cheating began to be a common thing. Cheats such as wallhack aimbot teleporting flying and other... was pretty much constant. The issue was partly solved due to ban waves new anti cheat and report system but still you can find cheaters when you play. The game has no story. You just jump out of the plane land loot and then shoot who ever you see. In the begging it was really fun and exciting especially when you play with friends over time it just gets boring and repetitive. Nothing is new other the occasion new map or weapon in the drop that you rarely have a chace to loot. Microtransactions problem. What is it with those microtransactions ? What is the purpose other to rip off money from people ? You can buy skins but you can't trade them ? You can buy the skin and clothes that you can practically loot then in the game. The maps are huge and there are 100 people and everything is so far away so nobody will actually check you skin or clothes. On the market they are expensive some of them cost as much as the game and more but you can still loot them in the game. So the only purpose is that if you buy them they will be shown in your inventory and your wallet will be dry . All in all it's a bit fun game when you play it with friends but due to too many flaws i wouldn't recommend this game at this time at this price. If its on sale or when if free for weekend try it out and decide for yourself.

review: DO NOT BUY! I've played this game for over 1000 hours. It was fun at first but when the hackers and performance problems lingered it was time to move on. I've been looking for something to replace it ever since. Fortnite is too dumbed down for me to enjoy however the Call of Duty Black Ops 4 Beta was promising enough for me to switch. On to something better. To the Deveolopers Thank you for trying. I know its not easy to make a game like this. Performance optimization is one of the hardest things to fix. I think you would have less cheaters if there was not money to be made from selling skins to other players. I made a fair amount of money selling crates to other players but ultimately that system incentivises cheating. If you sold skins the way League of Legends did I would have given you a lot more of my money. Best of luck.

review: The game is fun and the squad based fighting is just amazing. It really is fun and I rather dislike battle royal games only one I liked so far. Every game feels completely different and unique with how much of it is randomized. Very fun.. However I cannot recommend it for the following reasons 1. HACKERS There are a ton of Chinese hackers and they are not really doing anything to stop it. They could at least region lock China to stop about 99% of the hackers. Oh and the hacking is horrible snapping insta killing insta killing from 1 000m insta killing through mountains buildings etc. And there is nothing better than struggling and getting to the top 5 just for a hacker to kill you after all your hardwork.2. LAG The game is very laggy with terrible netcode. You will very frequently die in a fight after going behind cover just because of the lag.3. MICROTRANSACTIONSI wouldn't mind all that much it is afterall a 30 dollar game however you will open probably around 3 4 chests every week if you play casually and do okay. Before you could just open these and enjoy now most of them will be behind paywall a 2.5 dollar paywall. You used to feel some small reward for playing now it just feels like a punishment. "Oh you did well and earned some chests? Oh well now you have to pay to unlock those 'rewards'!". EA level garbage.4. GRAPHICSLike high graphics with max view range? BAD! WRONG! Put most of your settings to very low and put view distance to the lowest possible. You cripple yourself if you don't. With lower view distance grass disappears after about 100m giving you a HUGE advantage as people can't just prone and hide in grass. Absolutely moronic.For the most popular game on steam ever this is just unacceptable. Stopping the out of control hacking should of been their priority before microtransaction money grabs. I suspect they don't really have a solution and don't really care (i.e. no region lock of China).

review: I really like this game. Its a good combination of desire fun excitment nervousness and skill. It is very good at accomplishing satisfaction for example In the begining you decide where to land (Desire) high risk good loot low risk bad loot . Now when you do land you start scrambling for loot before anyone else. Once finished you most likely will need a vehicle (especially on Mirimar.) But toward the halfway mark there will be an air drop. Again high risk good loot low risk bad loot and the airdrop is EXTREMELY high risk with players aiming at every square inch of the crate (Skill) but after that comes the Top 10. The top is when things get real the remaining 10 players all in a small cirlce you also most likely don't know where they are so you have to listen VERY carefully (Nervousness). Lets say you made it to just one other person your blood is boiling heart pumping finally you see him and BOOM. Winner Winner Chicken Dinner! (Satisfaction).

Hackers are everywhere (been improved somewhat)4. Constantly taking falling damage from landing normally in parachute at the start of game (gets annoying after awhile)PROS1. Reasonably priced 2. Fun to play with friendsOVERALLGood Idea for a game but terribly executed. With all the money and popularity the game has recieved it should be a lot better optismised. The game can be extremely frustrating when dying or getting shot due to poor hit detection (moving behind a wall and still getting hit). The game is worth buying but only if they can fix the issues that it has.

review: When this first hit early access I had tons of fun making memories with friends and we all really enjoyed the game because it was a new playstyle and at the time it was unique and pleasant in its newness...now that its been over a year the same problems persist and it has gotten worse and worse with time...yeh they fixed certain issues and smoothed out certain aspects but ultimately I nor anyone I know cares how many new guns you add if you can never use them effectively due to desyncing...i would rather play the orignal content with ping caps than get new maps and new weapons....not to mention all this useless gear that I have to use RL money to acquire...dont give me a crate with in game content just to bog down my inventory because I wont spend the money to open it....if they had fixed the desyncing issue sooner then i would certainly be a more loyal fan but it is clear to me that they never will and if they do itll be too late since CoD and BFV will surely be dominating the battle royale market by then....good riddance

review: UPDATED REVIEW I took a break from PUBG then a few weeks later I read about a good update I installed the game again watched some WackyJacky recoil control videos for noobs (which I felt like even after 400h+) and it started clicking again. I started winning gunfights again regular top10 top5 top3 few Chicken Dinners.. I actually enjoy it again (althought I switched back to TPP). They definitely fixed that horrendous desync. It happens sometimes but not as frequent as previously. Region lock helps too although worked the opposite on the first day of that update.. Anyway I like it again and recommend it. PREVIOUS REVIEW That's it. I'm done. I'm ing done with this game. I've been playing since May 2017. 408 hours. Had a blast until they released it from EA. Ever since then it's been worse and worse with every single patch. 408 hours and I feel like I'm a ing gear delivery guy. I'm shooting at a ing guy 10 meters from me M4 fully geared up 40 bullets go into him he turns around and kills me with 3 shots. I look at the kill cam and the guy heard me walk turned around and killed me but I haven't fired a single bullet. What the ? Or I'm shooting at someone further away and my shots disappear. I'm not hitting the target (who is prone on a slope) and my bullets are not hitting the ground. Where the are my bullets going then?Oh and another thing. Recently after one of those excellent patches the game started dropping FPS. I get 60fps when I'm outside ultra everything etc then I enter a ing shed and it drops to 30fps... ON A ING 1080Ti !!!!!!! What the am I supposed to do then??? Buy a better card? There aren't any! you PUBG Corp. Go ahead and release new maps and new ing clothes. You lost it anyway. To a cartoon game. Because they knew what to focus on. No wonder you're dropping the price. All those bad reviews are 100% correct.I do not recommend this game to anyone. Uninstalled.

Fartnut has it down to a T when it comes to optimization AND content. PUBG stopped skin trades stopped free crates and theyre constantly holding back updates on these features. Im still a fan but i see my favorite game going downhill. Look at my hours Bluehole listen to your fans and players! open up the market again! release AVIATOR CRATES to the market! OPTIMIZE THE FPS! You are losing your crown to all the clones and theyre doing it BETTERUPDATE 11/23/2018 RECOMMENDEDThey fixed alot of the issues that the community was concerend about now i get an average of 75fps that would drop only in certain situations that seem rare for about 20fps drop the servers dont seem laggy anymore to me and im connected through ethernet cable. Market is open again but no trading. Give the game a go

review: This is legit one of the hardest games I've played in my loife. I have played this game for an unholy amount of hours and I'm still learning and I am somewhat still bad at the game after SO long playing I still suck big pp at PUBG.No less it's a great game the best BR game in my opinion the maps (notice how it's plural unlike fortnite.) are all really fun and all different. It's more realistic than fortnite too if you care about that.All in all PUBG is still interesting and fun most days I play it even after all this time. However there are still a few annoying problems witht he game that really grind my gears. For example the driving in pubg is appalling the simplist mechanics for driving are completely broken. In general there are a few glitches that still exist. With the game being so successful I expected the bugs to be fixed by now but no guess not. If you have friends and are somewhat into FPS games AND most importantly you can deal with the game being as hard as it is you will be more than happy with this game.9/10

As everything else in life you might like it or not so i really recommend to watch some videos or streams first (And if you have friends who are interested even better) in order to start fighting for your chicken dinner AkA "winner" ). Believe me having some chicken dinner is extremely satisfying.I hope this encourages you to at least try this excellent game and experience the feeling of a battle royale game.

review: Today I came to evaluate this game very seriously.In theory it's a great game but it's been badly ruined by the developers'mindlessness rampant plug ins and missealing.In order to make money developers launched a variety of clothes and gun skins after the game went live most of which were very expensive such as a key that opened the Spring Equinox box and sold for 18 yuan ($2.5). There are also changes in the content of the game the original version of Thomson and 98K belong to the airdrop now the game content is greatly changed so that some old players have to re familiar with the rules of the game. Now pubg is panicked when it sees a huge drop in the number of players and comes up with an old version of the model (I forgot the name) that wants to save the old players. Then there's the plug in problem and now the game is full of plug ins acceleration locks perspective self aiming through the wall...! Surprisingly the game hall all kinds of publicity plug in pubg has no ability to manage so indulge and those publicity plug in will not get off the plane (reason I think). Finally is the issue of mis sealing teammates hang up they also have to be implicated teammates fly hanging you will be blocked teammates open materials show hanging you will be blocked! Even if you use a grenade to kill several people the system will judge you to be a plug in!I hope that pubg can collect the suggestions of the majority of players do not blindly pursue the interests when the players are satisfied the interests naturally exist the players are not satisfied you are likely to have no money.

review: My all time favorite feature of this game has to be the upgraded server connection package you can get. I play with friends constantly that always seem to have issues with desync or rubber banding to the point they can walk through walls. I haven't had these issues since I became a multi million view streamer and got in good with the development team. They handed me the package free of charge asking me to keep it on the low for now of course. The only problem I have from time to time are the Asian's and their ability to never miss. #Notevenonce. Although I think region locking Asia would be a good thing I can't stomach the thought of loading into the plane and not hearing "CHINA NUMBA ONE" Overall the game is fantastic at keeping you on your toes and if you love the Punisher this game is for you. The start of every game will almost always be you bringing a knife to a gun fight.

title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: PUBG is what you get when amateur developers have a good idea for what could be a great game with a small budget to start with. Now that they've made many millions (close to a billion on PC sales alone) all they see is money. They no longer care about player experience. Why spend money to make the game better when most of the people that would buy the game have already bought it?Mistakes / poor decisions First mistake was the game engine that they built the game on. It wasn't designed for 100 players so they had to reduce the server tickrate to ridiculously low rates. There are better engines that can handle 100 players but I guess they went with the cheaper solution. Client side hit detection. This is why you can still get shot after you get into cover. Players with high ping have a big advantage over players with low ping. No region lock or ping lock. They talked about implementing this months ago but now you're racist or "xenophobic" toward Chinese people if you want this feature. Setting a max ping or locking players to their region would reduce the poor experience of having client side hit detection. Lootboxes. Everything about them. Some items like the school girl outfit sell for over $1k on the marketplace. Huge incentive for cheaters since you get points for kills and wins to buy these loot boxes with. They also just came out with locked lootboxes so you play to get your points to get the rewards and then you have to pay $3 to open the box or sell the box for around 25 cents (current price on the marketplace). Not really banning cheaters. Most cheaters sell all the items they get from their lootboxes Bluehole gets a cut of every sale. Then they ban the cheater but allow them to just buy the game again to keep playing/cheating/selling and the cycle continues. Bluehole makes money every step of the way so why would they change this? They make way more money from a cheater than they do from a regular player. STEREO sound... what year is this?? Some "minor" issues with game design that could be easily fixed like making bullets come from your gun instead of your chest slowing the circles down a bit etc. But compared to the above points these are pretty minor.What would make this game better? Engine that can handle 100 players with a decent tickrate. Server side hit detection (only works well with a good server tickrate). Actually ban cheaters (IP MAC address etc.). I know there are ways around it but it's not as easy as just buying another copy of the game. Sell rare items like the schoolgirl uniform for example. Lots of people like being able to sell/trade things on the marketplace so keep that if you must but if Bluehole sold items themselves (even just the rare items) it would control the prices and make cheating less lucrative. If they sold the schoolgirl outfit for like $50 they would make millions. Win win for everyone.If they had their own store for selling cosmetic items they would have a steady income stream from people that own the game and they wouldn't care as much about the steady income from banning cheaters and having them buy the game again. It would also give them incentive to improve the game to keep people playing and buying stuff. Bluehole can take these Desperado crates and shove them up their I will never buy a key to open one and I won't sell them on the marketplace so that they can make more money. Using points I earned to get a crate that I have to pay to open is not a reward greedy Region / Ping lock. There are servers in every major region why do people need to play on a server that's on the other side of the world? If the game had server side hit detection having a higher ping would be a disadvantage so it wouldn't be as big of an issue. Surround sound. Good positional audio is important in any FPS.If they made these changes I would recommend this game... but we're more likely to see a better studio make a better game before any of this happens.Why is it so popular then? It's exciting really gets the adrenaline pumping. You start with nothing and there's no respawn so everything you do matters and every decision you make can win or lose the round for you where to drop what to loot how long to spend looting where to go when to go there when to fight when to flee etc. Randomness of loot and circles makes those decisions and each round a little different. Option to go solo duo or squads each mode changing the way you play the game.All of this makes for a fun and addicting game.. until you die to a cheater or someone with high ping killing you after you get into cover (or they came around the corner and saw you before you could see them) or not being able to hit the guy outside your building because your bullets are coming out of your chest and hitting the window sill etc.The most frustrating thing about all that is that Bluehole is not doing enough to fix it. The only punishment for cheaters is having to buy another copy of the game how greedy can you get? They don't want to region/ping lock because they don't want to offend the Chinese and they make a lot of money from them especially since a large majority of the cheaters are from China. That's not racism that's fact.There are several Chinese players in every round on NA servers many of them are cheaters some of them are just there to get away from the asian servers that are full of cheaters but they still have an advantage due to their high ping. 0.05% of them are there to play with their friends in NA and that's the main reason Bluehole said they don't want to region/ping lock. In squads and duo's where communication is very important it really sucks to get teamed up with someone that can only speak enough english to say "China numba wun".Greed and incompetence ruined what could have been an awesome game. This just seems to be a very short sighted money grab when it could easily be a long term revenue stream.

review: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS is a competitive casual online multiplay survival battle royale. I'm surprised that I liked this game as much as I do cause I'm not that good at competitive shooters. You can play in a squad of two to four people or just you against the world. Each game starts with about 100 people the last person or squad alive wins a chicken dinner. In the beginning of the match everyone choose when to drop from the plane that fly across the map and every couple of minutes the play area shrinks damaging everyone outside the circle. You gather armor guns and supplies to survive. The combat is pretty satisfying when people aren't hacking. It still has a couple a bugs but they don't really take any thing away from the game. This is a great pick up and sit down game as well as a spend hours on too. And I give this a 8/10.

review: I suck pretty damn hard at this game. But for the time I manage to remain alive before I'm gunned down I do enjoy it.I seem to be pretty good at being sneaky and getting to the final small group of people but my cross eyed attempts at weapon handling really let me down. But hey I'm just happy to take part.I love the minute or so of banter at the start of each game you can have a good laugh with people or really rile people up. I managed to get half the plane to jump off at the school on a few occasions to fist fight me. Of course I stayed on the plane and jumped at the other end of the map haha.So I guess I play this game more as a bit of fun than to win. I understand there are some people who take it quite seriously though and thats fine.The whole lootboxing thing is of no interest to me I just grabbed a few bits of clothing from the marketplace for a few pence just so I have a bit of choice. I'm certainly not going to be spending money on keys and crates or whatever the deal is but again some people do that and thats fine. So its there if thats your thing.Theres alot of mixed reviews on this game but I think it comes down to your personal expectations of it. I play a few games now and then for a laugh and I enjoy it. I don't take it seriously or play competitively and thats fun for me.It does seem like the game is headed more in a microtransaction way from what I've seen of these updates recently. Its a shame but its happening alot in gaming these days people gotta make money. New maps and game modes would be nice additions or a more in depth character creation. I'm not sure if these are planned or not but its a couple of things I personally would like to see added instead of lootboxing.This brings me to my conclusion. And its not a good one. Although the game can be fun the constant money grabbing by the devs and lack of attention to fixing bugs and problems is going to kill this game off. There are also many issues with hacking I hear China is one of the main culprits and it seems like the devs are ignoring this or refusing to do anything about it.Stop money grabbing.Stop releasing skins.Fix the game.Add content.Stop hackers.This game had so much potential to be a genre leader for years but thats now been ruined. Just look at the reviews. Mostly negative.

review: I love this game so damn much. But I can't justify suggesting it to anybody due to the practices of Bluehole. It has been in 1.0 for just about a year now and while many fun things have been added there have been next to 0 optimizations of this game in areas that it desparately needs. The new map Sanhok is great and is a lot of fun but in my mind it's just a little too late. For a 30 dollar game you get brutal lag spikes boatloads of cheaters/hackers car physics that will be like driving a piece of paper into a tornado (seriously you'll just end up at a crazy high velocity and die). This was my favorite game for around a year+. I can't support Bluehole in the direction they've been going while neglecting the most important parts of the game that make it enjoyable for everyone. Stay away at ALL COSTS

review: The grrrr I want to uninstall this piece of #!) %&amp game and never recommend it to anyone days You land together with others and weapons spawn too late or you can not pick up the weapons due to lag/desync/hamster potato servers etc. There is still alot of bad funkyness happening with the animation side of things vs the server and all the animations played vs the animations seen from your opponent. Did that guy lean? Did he really? Death cam did not register it. How the hell did I NOT die there? (A nade gets stuck in a toilet or sink and the damage you take is zero.) A game that does not allow the player to opt in and perform their best. Simply put. The game holds the player from being able to fully operate alot of times. You know you will have a good game when the players of the game turns to talk about the game the match the shots and strategies instead of talking about the lag desync or how broken the game can be at times. This game promotes and rewards action per action chess like movement overall. Find your spot hold position zoom shoot. nade. pray. loot. repeat. There is alot of unpolished stuff going on under the hood here and we all see it while the studio tries to refine the outer layers and fix some of the tricky stuff going on below. Lots of more to add here...But then.... some days and with the right couple of friends in the side seats... this experience are great if you overlook the other funky stuff...The awsome days and fun side of this game That feeling of doing a crazy game wild shooting and lots of action keeping your team alive. Noticing that mid game does a hard circle switch. Burst into tears but your team does not give up you jump into vehicles screaming while you drive through bullet rains and red zones but you somehow manage to survive then shortly after do a drive by and manage to pick up a crate and continue driving into late game and land perfectly on a roof top and go down the stairs... bang goes the flash and manage to kill the last couple of guys. I find it hard to find another game that gives such a rush and such fun. Such rounds of fun games with friends.

review: Player Unknown's Battleground's or as it is called for short PUBG is a Battle Royale shooter that puts you in one of two maps with other 99 players. Let me not exaggerate here LARGE maps. Not really exaggerating. There will be alot of walking in game. Which brings me to it's gameplay... For most of my gaming experience I have been walking. Alot of silence and camping in PUBG. Which can be actually boring at times. It brings short bursts (if any) of thrill shooting down a person or team or car (i like the cars).You can actually sell your crates! Which is what I do! Got a decent amount of money of selling them in all honesty. If you play PUBG you should sell your crates (if you are not interested in crates) but you might have the chance of getting a rare weapon skin that you can get even more money with.And the chat or community can be fun! But most times when I am in a VC in the plane or something someone is playing earape music or a horrible meme through the mic. (really hate that can ya' guys stop doing that kthx)And lastly frames oh the frames. This has improved through updates which I am actually pretty happy about. But you are going to need a gaming computer to run this properly. To run it at 1080p 60 or 1080p 30.So then I come up with a full conclusion (2 actually).If you like shooters are okay with waiting and camping and want to make some money from selling crates in the long term or something close to that Go ahead and buy the game.If you like shooters and you hate camping and want non stop action and are okay with still dealing with earape music (buddy that is everywhere) and don't have the PC for it.Don't buy it and go for an alternative (fortnite.I recommend it anyways because it's really not a bad game.The short bursts can be rewarding and those who are prepared to camp and maybe work with thier team mates looting the large maps and having some fun with the proximity voice chat.I listed alot of negatives. But in the end I like PUBG.

review: Best Battle Royale game avalible on the Steam Market right now.I've had the pleasure of participating in the closed beta as well as preordering my copy ready for Early Access release and I've got to say I like where this is going.PlayerUnkown invented the Battle Royale game mode his experience from ArmA and H1Z1 now combined into this amazing game BATTLEGROUNDS.You'll start your adventure in a jumbo plane with the other 98 100 players sitting with you in BATTLEGROUNDS you get to choose when to jump and decide where to land and begin looting instead of it being a RNG cluster of "Who can land first and find a gun first"Like many other games in this genre you're forced into an ending point but in BATTLEGROUNDS they've substuted the cliché gas by an energy field spooky stuff.Airdrops will drop in throughout the game providing you with better weapons or health items.You will rage at some point playing this.

review: Then there's the general gameplay bugs. You can easily clip on something while driving and then your vehicle is destroyed. This type of bug has never been fixed.Other random collision issues on objects when shooting sometimes you think your shot should clear an object but because a collision model wasn't done correctly the bullet will hit something else. Especially prevalent around window frames the top of fences and walls.The general player base is terrible. There is no region filter so a lot of people get stuck with players who don't speak the same language. I've been demanded by Chinese players to speak Chinese on an Australian server.These are some basic ideas that should have been implemented at the start back in early access.1. Have a language preference. You should be able to select your native language and get paired with other people on the same team who speak your language. This will solve the issue of having team mates you can't communicate with. 2. Default to the server with the lowest ping but also give the choice for server selection.3. The ability to report bugs through the player death cam. You can only report cheating in the current state of the game.Please don't give this company your money. They don't deserve it.I do like the concept of a battle royale game but I'm sure another company will do a much better job. This is what happens when you only care about money instead of improving your product. I have no idea how they can call this a proper launch it's like the game never left early access.

review: Game is a solid 10/10 works great feels great. Amazing. Good graphics. Fantastic PvP makes kills feel rewarding and always keeps you on edge and since 1.0 fixed nearly all of the bugs and glitches I honestly have 0 complaints. review: PUBG is definitely the most addicting and fun multiplayer game at the moment. Despite the criticisms about technical glitches and lag from the previous versions I am happy to report that the December 28 2017 update of PUBG 1.0 runs super smoothly for me i.e. on a Razer laptop equipped with Nivdia GTX1060. No lag or problem so far. And everyone in the family enjoys both playing it and watching others play. Highly recommended for a family therapy. Here are my recommendations for future developments 1. The next map should definitely take place during winter with a lot of snow white gears etc.2. Enable players to climb up high ladders towers and antenas.3. The crossbow is useless. Make it more powerful.But for now time has come to sharpen my knives and return to the battlegrounds...

review: Up until this most recent update I thought the game was progressing towards a fun game. But as I said this most recent update has turned a fun game into complete bloody diahrea. I can't even turn my character anymore with out experiencing latency issues. I first thought it was the opening rendering that had always occurred like with weapons load in for the first time. But it continued on past that. I then thought okay well it was be my graphic settings since there was a new update maybe they reset ... nope still diahrea. I turned my settings from High and Ultra down to VERY LOW and I still couldn't turn or move with out latency. So I restarted my computer and router/ modem and attempted a second time. Low and behold it was ... Bloody Stool still... This game took a Battle Royal Concept and built upon it and I enjoyed it far more than the others at it's time of release. Then I saw as Fortnite came out with a version of their own. Player unknown watched as the players that filled those servers in pubg then filled the Fortnite BR servers instead. So what did PUBG do in their ultimate wisdom? They added emotes to the game as to think THAT is what they went there for. Not the servers not lagging why would they want a game that didn't lag? I will answer that for you because when there is a guy standing to our left we want to turn our camera and kill him. Instead on Pubg we turn but not to him 90 degrees ... no you turn 180 deg and then die because you lagged while trying to turn and shoot someone....The Dev team really needs to stop worrying about other games they will always be there. The Devs they need to focus on making their game function the way everyone would like it to not how they want it to because they saw it in a different game.Devs if you read this (What a pipe dream that is) focus on your game get the new weather system released get more maps released get done and for Christ's sake OPTIMIZE your damn game. For now I am Up voting you I believe you guys can get it done and done correctly. Do that. But if this game continues to end up more ed up than the last time I played it you will be Down Voted and just be another un happy person ... well more so than I already am )
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: The game had its ups it was engaging enough for me to still keep playing. The guns were interesting. some of the health items were useful as such and even the cast iron pan was funny to be a weapon. But all and all this game is a literal dumpster fire. From its lag whiny and toxic players and even the hackers flat out ruining a game and not to mention all the gimmicks that try to sucker you into playing this more. Dont bother buying this game. It's not even worth the 30 bucks.

review: It was a fabulous game when it first came out got the gang back together from ARMA and had a blast... But.... its not worth the hassle anymore.It was a slow and mundane process of updates logging in issues etc.. etc.. and like most games you just lose interest after awhile. The lobby screen which you constantly have to restart to be able to have a squad game(currently) is on track to become the TV screen in Idiocracy when the lawyer is "bating"... ADs everywhere!Not only that a "leveling" system is integrated where you get items after achieving things but you need to buy them and keys... those effin' keys. Recently while waiting for other games to be released (COD BO FALLOUT 76) I wanted to play with some friends but the recent patch/update wont even let a squad join a game after readying up... not worth the hassle anymore. Maybe I'll check back in on it after it exits Early Access stage.

review: November 2018 EDIT PUBG is in a much cleaner state than it was even 6 months ago. With training options better optimizations and more reliable net code. It's not perfect but other than BO4 its the best FPS BR. It's easily a 100hour buyTL DR Don't buy it until the devs get there together use the millions of dollars they have accumulated and fix the boat load of problems and dryed lake of content that is PUBGPUBG is a game I love and also love to hateComing from a background of TF2 and CSGO the idea of having 100 other people starting out at the same place as you and trying to get to be the last one alive seemed like something I would both be good at and have a lot of fun doingThe problem is the game is broken from the core. With an engine that would have been considered average 5 years ago terrible client side hit registration and net code that rivals ubisoft launch server levels of horrid. If you like rubber band guns this is a game for youThe good PUBG is an incredibly fun game with a good team. And there is every now and then a game that will get your heart racing and make you feel like a god. Driving is fun its got an easy to learn hard to master arcadey vibe Weapons have a nice feeling to them and bullet drop feels good enough First person exsists so you arent locked in the third person like you are in other popular royale games.... Getting into a game takes little to no time at all. But if you have a speedy SSD you spend enough time waiting for all the other players to load in that it really makes no diffrence Adrenaline factory The bad Damage feedback is practically non exsistant. Blood splatters dont mean anything half the time and just because you see blood from the head doesnt mean you actually hit them there (I have had highlights with proof and there are youtube videos galore with it) Netcode as mentioned before Player base. The cancer from every oozing inch of the internet has infiltrated this game and makes it so you cant have dry eardrums without having microphones muted RNG sometimes youre blessed with a crate. Sometimes youre blessed with exploring half of po i and somehow only having an a M16 and a shotgun with low ammo and level 1 gear. Othertimes you drop and instantly find an M4 and KAR98 You will die from stupid places. No matter how good you are or how much attention you pay to your surroundings you will die to some form of trash. Nades are insanely powerful and underused Boring gun variety after 20 hours of play Severe lack of maps and map diversity. Seriously generic desert map with 5 diffrent buildings and stupidly open bush camping green boi. Erengel is just more fun in my opinion Weird texture glitches and shuddering. You'll be running and things all over the place on your screen will wiggle and have weird clipped shadows The game gets broken every other update Seriously the net code is awful even after 4 reworks or however many they have had Beefy computer is needed for the game to be enjoyable (in my opinion)Don't buy it until its been polished
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Based on my experience I haven't encountered any hackers "yet" however I'm hoping for the worst. Despite the negative review for this game I have to say I recommend this game because it has a nice player base no toxic community "as for now" decent graphics and the list goes on.But the one main thing that is quite bad is its optimization the servers are a bit laggy there are several frame drops which is quite questionable for me (but it mostly just frame drops when I drop from the plane and I get 40 60 fps when I land on the ground).Overall this game has a lot of potential and devs need to give more time on what the community really needs and not new skins. It's an epic game imo.Also it has the potential to be called China SImulator 2018Edit I got killed by a hacker who was not aiming at me lmaoEdit Some bugs are fixed now very cool.

review: I hate reviewing games. Absolutely. Hate. But I felt the need to say something about this game because it certainly doesn't deserve the amount of negativity it has. Most of the people you will encounter who will talk poorly about this game will talk about the bugs and how poorly it runs. I currently run a system with 16 GB DDR4 RAM an i5 7600k and a 1060Ti 6GB. Not an incredibly high end system but I don't have trouble running many games at maximum/near maximum settings. Point is I run this game around 150fps without a problem at full Ultra settings. So this game's optimization is perfectly fine. It's not as broken as Ark Survival Evolved is/was I think we can all agree on that. So the bugs in this game. The bugs are ing hilarious. It's rare that you run into a bug that absolutely demolishes the game for you. Sure you can crash your bike into someone's car and send it hurdling miles into the sky but it brings a chuckle out every time. You can take this game as seriously as you'd like but this game is harsh. Personally I've run into less people hacking in this game than I have in Rainbow Six Siege or Counter Strike Global Offensive. To be fair I have more hours in both of those games but the ratio still feels entirely off. If I had to take a guess I would say I've run into a hacker maybe six times total in PUBG. This game is horrid on your own. It's brutal you sweat and try your damn off and it only pays off if you end up being that 1/100 that wins the game. But. If you can get off your and make some friends (Quit clocking months of hours into a game by yourself it's not good for your mentality bb &lt 3) then you'll have a great time. Some of my favorite memories from playing games over the last few years with my friends come from this game. It's buggy and hilarious. Winning feels so gratifying especially when you do it by running people over in a Dacia and wacking people with a pan. I feel that many people take this game too seriously when they play. This isn't CS GO you aren't trying to reach Global Elite and inevitably give up after hitting 2500 hours. No. This is PUBG this game is a great time with friends. All around I'd give it a solid 7.5/10. I have yet to try the new map but from what I have seen the map looks like what the game needs. Smaller more action less walking/driving and a lot more to look at.

review: Ever since PUBG came out it has been main Multiplayer game there have been a few breaks here and there where I played less but I have so far always come back to it there have been many other battle royale games at this point but PUBG remains my favorite.There is just something about the battle royale concept that makes online matches really thrilling knowing you have one life and as the player count drops kill by kill you know you are getting closer to that first place sure you can play it super safe and then find it boring after a while but you can also really go for it and hunt other players all play styles work in there own way and its another reason why I like this type of game our squad doesn't really follow a set playstyle we adapt on the go and each match is different.I used to play online shooters like Battlefield etc and while they are still fun I just can't get into them anymore ever since I started playing PUBG there is just something about the Royale genre that always gives you those extra thrills during the match as the player numbers lower and lower you just feel the adrenaline as you get closer to that oooh so sweet winner winner chicken dinner! )I would recommend playing this game with a group of friends its deffo at its best then I hardly play solo Duo's and Suads is where its at!

review: PUBG has had many updates to improve the game and now due to the game being called "not playable" due to the hackers and game breaking glitches and much more stuff. PUBG has been receiving many harsh reviews which are true in some ways. But early in Agust PUBG had announced that they know that the game isn't getting anywhere and that the game needs a way to get better with FIX PUBG. FIX PUBG is months long campaign to deliver the changes and improvements that we ve been asking for. With PUBG making this change they've been banning a lot more hackers and fixing glitches but this doesn't mean that the game is not fully fixed. Now for newcomers who are wanting to try the game out do it!!!! Be expecting that the game may have glitches but don't refund if you don't like it PUBG has gotten better this year than most of the other years which I think is a huge Improvement and the game is coming to be an even better game than it is now. PUBG is playable now so I highly recommend to try the game out before hearing someone else talk trash. You can never judge a game without playing it so give this one a try. THIS GAME IS ONLY GOING TO GET BETTER

review: This game could have been great but it is in the wrong hands. This game needs a development team that listens to its fans but unfortunately they have one that completely ignores its fans. Although this games developers claims it has amazing audio it doesn t. I don t want to be playing a game where when I get shot at i have no idea where I m being shot from. Those reasons I mentioned were minor to me what really killed the game for me is the hackers. This game has an in game marketplace where you can buy crates with battle points which are earned through winning matches. In the crates are a random piece of clothing or weapon skin that you can either equip or sell for real money. This is what brought the hackers in. If you can hack and farm battle points to then purchase crates and sell the things you earn then you can make a good living doing this. I can t stand playing a game where every 5 matches I get undisputedly killed by a hacker. Although I am glad Bluehole is at least making some attempts to fix this problem but I am already done with this game.

review: I've been playing pubg since it's initial steam release and this game has always been massively overrated on every level. For a while it filled a void when the hunger for BR's was overwhelming and people were sick of H1Z1. Pubg has improved greatly overall.HOWEVER! Pubg is still incredibly boring. This game has always had a pacing issue. I just got done playing for around 2 hours and in all that time had 3 gun fights. If you drop hot you could insta die due to loot RNG but if you drop out in the boonies then get ready for 15+ minutes of driving running and looting.The time you spend in this game running from zone to zone looting and driving vastly out numbers the time you ACTUALLY spend in combat. Probably 50% of matches you only get into a fight in the last few circles and the other you have one on drop then another the last few circles. VERY RARELY do you get a match where it is non stop action EXTREMELY RARELY.PUBG is chalked full of boring slow dead time. The maps are far too big and when you do get into a fight it almost always with 4x 8x scopes at range filled with stutter step peeking.None of this is helped by the player bases reactive and defensive play style where they wanna drop in the middle of nowhere or are driving the vehicle your squad is in and don't wanna stop and fight the guys who took a few pot shots at you. Everyone is so consumed with being in the top 10 they ignore that this is a FPS shooter until then.Solos are unbearable because again the massive amounts of dead time in the game and not having people to share that with makes it a chore.There are many BR's out right now and if you are like me fortnite is a little kids game COD everyone is a bullet sponge(although it has the best pacing of all the BR's out right now) H1Z1 is dated asf so all you are left with is PUBG. This game could have been great if it shrank the map size and increased loot spawns so you don't have to loot 50+ houses just to get level 2 armor and 2 decked out guns. Sadly this is never going to happen so we are left with a running sim.6/10Incredibly overrated and all around average from graphics to combat to gameplay.

review: The concept is great the gameplay is great everything is great but...The game is so raw I haven't seen so unoptimized one. Basically it is so bad that it makes the game often unplayable. FPS is low it is lagging and textures of houses might load for a couple of minutes.Untill it will be optimized at leas a bit I coudn't recomend it.UPDATE after 1 month patch.So the first "performance patch" made it worse. Now the game is not going anywhere after the loading screen for 5 min.Update after 2nd month The game is stil Taking all the RAM not possible to play on 8 GB RAM even if the reqs says it's 6RAM minimum.Update after 4th month The game became a joke. From my experience in early access games this devs are the worst. Making patches that breaking all the game features.Update after 1 year Now the game doesn't load 2/3 of the matches for the last 2 weeks.Update after 1.5 years Now the game is finally good.

Just remove them nobody uses them for a real engagement ever. Besides they were designed to be anyways. Simply u s e l e s s. Buying this now is clearly a waste of time and money. New maps and guns only go so far in a broken game.

review: Product received for free. Hello steam wanted to give a quick review on this game months after review this game is very brilliant but suffers from many obvious errors such as lag spikes and many things that cause FPS drops for no particular reason. the maps are beautifully designed and the game always brings a new and vibrant feel every game you play. being a person who loves first person shooters i managed to crunch out many hours in this game with friends and collegues from work. as the hacker issue for me has no been almost non exsistent i have been able to enjoy this game massively and would reccomend this to anyone who is looking for a competitve enviroment. The other downsides of this game is it can sometimes be frustrating when radical things happen and the damage and hitbox can sometimes be annoying and doesnt add up. They should develop a new system that can properly disperse damage. I will most likely update this review in the further months if i have decided to completly quit this game.update after another amounf of countless hours and at the time of this update at 1.4k hours i have to say its depressing where the game is at now. its really disappointing that this company couldnt and hasnt fixed the desync issue as for some reason it got worse and worse over the patches i wish this game was where it was at before the big updates such as the sanhok one but so many bugs came with the updates they pushed out and its really sad as im at the point where i may not longer be playing this game im selling all my collected items and wont be playing this game until they fix the issues.update 2 although i quit this game i still believe that this game should win game of the year as it is one of the most played games of the year and up until now it might have been one of the best games on the steam market.

review: 6月份入的游戏 当时游戏优化很烂我没有给差评 7月份到9月份游戏火爆同时在线量从20万飙升到150万 导致服务器天天爆炸我也没有给差评 10月份外挂满天飞 自瞄 透视 加速 瞬移 吸人 锁血 被各种孤儿虐我一样没有给差评 蓝洞和迅游 腾讯合作的时候我也不会给差评 因为我知道蓝洞一直在努力提升大家的游戏体验 只是团队较小 确实可能能力有些不足 但是毕竟在努力 但是 12月我第一个给了差评 为什么? 因为他卢本伟开挂这么多视频证据 官方居然选择沉默 包庇 为什么我的SKS开镜就有呼吸 他卢本伟的就可以保持那么久不抖 作为X鱼TV现在最火的主播带头开外挂 官网却选择坐视不理的行为 我感到非常的愤怒 挂逼卢本伟不封号 差评不改 6월에 입사 게임 당시 게임 최적화 드럽네. 내가 뭐 거의 평가 7 월 부터 9월 게임 터졌는데 동시에 양 은 20만 폭등하고 있다 까지 150만 발생해서 서버에서 매일 폭발 나도 뭐 거의 평가 10 월 조각을 이리저리 싸다니는 사람이니 스스로 겨냥 투시 속도 瞬移 흡입 사람 자물쇠 피.각종 의해 고아 학대하다 같이 좀 거의 없다.푸른 동 和迅 여행 을 텐 센트 협력 때 나도 거의 안 줘.내가 아는 푸른 동 계속 열심히 향상 모두의 게임 체험 그냥 팀 작은 확실히 능력이 좀 부족한 수도 있지만 그래도 노력.근데!12월 내 첫 번째 에게 거의 평가!왜? 때문에 그는 卢本伟 열다 걸려 이렇게 많은 비디오 증거를 공식 뜻밖에도 선택 침묵?변호?왜 내 SKS 크랭크 인하다 있으면 호흡?그는 卢本伟 그냥 그렇게 오래 유지할 수 안 왔다고?로서 X 물고기 TV 지금 가장 대박이었던거야 해설자 지도적 열다 로봇 공식 오히려 선택 못 참으니까 행위.나는 대단히 분노!卢本伟 걸려 자백을 안 封号 거의 평가 고치지 않다.In June into the game then the game optimization sucks I didn't give a bad review July to September hit of the game online at the same time increased from 200 thousand soared to 1 million 500 thousand I also did not cause the server explosion to bad day October plug everywhere since aim perspective acceleration teleport suction lock blood. I did not give a bad comment by all the orphans. Blue hole and tour when Tencent I do not give. Because I know the blue hole has been trying to improve the experience of the game but the team is small and it may be a little weak but after all it's hard. But! I first gave a bad comment in December! Why? Because Lu Benwei has so much video evidence that the official chose to be silent? Cover up? Why is my SKS we have to breathe? Can he keep Lu Benwei so long? As the X fish TV who is now the hottest host the official chooses to sit down. I feel very angry! Lu Benwei is not sealed and the comment is not changed.

review: The games fun I'll give er that.Pros Tons of annoying but funny glitches (Flying cars glitching into the ground hitting nothing and launching into the air etc)Unique guns with great modeling &amp texturing doneFairly easy to win gamesEasy to learn Hard to masterCons Small variety of decent weapons weaponsCheatersRandom teammates will often kill you (This is from my personal experience)For my fellow french speaking citizens Les jeux amusants je vais donner ça.Avantages Des tonnes de pépins agaçants mais drôles (voitures volantes glitching dans le sol ne rien frapper et se lancer dans les airs etc.)Pistolets uniques avec une bonne modélisation et texturationAssez facile de gagner des jeuxFacile à apprendre difficile à maîtriserLes inconvénients Petite variété d'armes d'armes décentesTricheursLes coéquipiers au hasard te tueront souvent (ceci est de mon expérience personnelle) This is an update to the review..Ceci est une mise à jour de la revue ..Since my first review on PUBG somehow the game has deteriorated in all sorts of different aspects.FPS Ever since my review I was able to run PUBG on high for about 2 months with a modest FPS of 70 80 these days I can barely load into the inventory on low.Bugs &amp Fixes The devs of PUBG have done little to fix alot of the bugs on the game instead they add continuless buyable content to squeeze out the playerbase.Recent Updates With this new update making it so you have to pay for events is disgusting having to pay $39 for a game which is already unoptimized broken &amp not cared for than charging the community $15 for EVENTS!? The Devs have gone out of their way to show they do not care anymore. FRENCH Depuis ma première critique sur PUBG le jeu s'est détérioré dans toutes sortes d'aspects.FPS Depuis mon examen j'ai été en mesure de courir PUBG sur le haut pendant environ 2 mois avec un modeste FPS de 70 80 ces jours je peux à peine charger dans l'inventaire à bas.Bugs et correctifs Les devs de PUBG ont fait peu pour résoudre beaucoup de bugs sur le jeu à la place ils ajoutent du contenu buy in continuless pour faire sortir la base de joueurs.Mises à jour récentes Avec cette nouvelle mise à jour vous devrez payer pour des événements dégoûtants devoir payer 39 $ pour un jeu qui n'est déjà pas optimisé cassé et pas pris en charge que de charger la communauté 15 $ pour les ÉVÉNEMENTS !? Les Devs se sont mis en quatre pour montrer qu'ils s'en foutent. Another UpdateMajor update is coming to PUBG witht he release of another map....Instead of trying to fix optimization BlueHole keeps releasing new content to try and grab more &amp more players instead of trying to keep the ones they used to have.

review: It has its flaws fixes can be too slow to get applied functionality can break with each new update... It's easy to only highlight the bad things with the game. It's certainly not perfect but still not as terrible as some make it out to be the gunplay is incredibly satisfying the intensity of duels can be mind blowing and the satisfaction of a well executed rotation or enemy squad wipe with your team is superb. And I believe the game will only get better as more updates come in.If you haven't tried it yet or you're considering coming back to it I would suggest 2 things playing with friends (not to say solo play is bad) and staying away from reddit at least until you've formed your own opinion )

I also love CSGO over COD because of slow pacing btw .Overall amazing game hope they keep it alive for longer time and this game dont die. They need to make it more competative. 25th November 2018 I was never against idea of paid skins but pay to change name? thats wrong. I recommend this game because there is no alternative I thought COD blackout would be great that isnt the case. WIll play till I have alternative

review: Very poor servers frequent lags and stutterings during match starts (inconsistent fps slow picking of items etc) which are very critical moments of the game considering they are the most intense and exciting. Wouldnt be surprised to see this game dies not too far ahead should the developers not fix these basic fundamental elements of a game. A smooth and stable gameplay ahead of ANYTHING else (new skins backgrounds effects textures etc are all secondary) simple and easy to understand. One simply does not and should NOT need an godlike computer setup and internet speed just to run a single damn game smoothly even on low graphic settings. Thats crazy and suicidal towards the game itself considering not everyone has the access to such setups.

There are cheaters and they have tried to do a lot to combat them but there are cheaters in a lot of online games. Personally I have seen very few and the report system seems to be working.In summary its a great game.

review: Optimization This game is poorly optimized. I will about 20% of the time not load into the game until Im halfway through course of the plane's full ride. Maps They recently created a new map based off of a desert terrain. This new map added many good things like new cars and new buildings but the map itself is not good. The original map is better in almost everyway in my opinion. GunPlay They recently added some new guns to the game. They added a Win94 which I love a lot for early play. They also added a new AR called the AUG which is a better Groza. I like a lot of the guns but they also messed a lot of the older guns.They completely screwed up zeroing distance which messed up sniping and long range battles for most of the players relying on it. They also nerfed the S12k(which is horrible now) and the decided to strip certain guns of the 8x scope privelage. Cars They added several new cars which I love to drive and run my teamates over with but they also need to fix certain things. I was playing a round on a bike and we ran through 3 fences and we went for a fourth but that fence wasnt breakable so we blew up and died. They should make it either all of a certain type of object is breakable or none of them. Others Players When playing this game I almost never play with randos because 97.42% of the time its a 25 year old Chinese Male. When considering to buy this game make sure you have a couple of friends to play it with or it wont be as fun. Overall thought I think this game is very fun with friends but far from what it can possibley be. I would and have reccomended this game to many friends of mine.Optimization 2/5Maps 3/5GunPlay 4/5Cars 4/5Overall 3/5 or 7/10 SaltShaker Reviews

review: No I would not recommend you buy this game now. The price has remained firm at $36.99 CAD dispite pretty much all other games going on sale on Steam multiple times a year.Similarly the gameplay has remained virtually the same as it was when PUBG was Early Access and you still get bugged out and have an unoptomized mess. You want to heat up your whole room and have your fans spinning at 9001 RPM??? Well here's a piece of software for $37 CAD that turns your desktop into a space heater.Honestly play Fortnite COD BO4 or anything else instead. Yes the other Battle Royale games all have bugs too but PUBG is by far the worst of the worst and just a poor excuse of a game.

review: Alright I love this game I have sunk almost 1300 hours into it. It's a fun milsim/battle royal hybrid that is seriously fun. Playing with squads and mates was very rewarding however the developers have ruined it and seem completely uninterested in servicing their OCE player base.You should not buy this game!The developers have shown clear and absolute apathy for fixing game breaking bugs in favour of chasing quick cash. The menu doesn't load right most of the time. Alot of the time you can't all "ready up" without restarting lobby. OCE players cannot get a game on an OCE server (in fact it is so bad I seriously believe it is being intentionally mismanaged at this point).Seriously for a released game this isn't good enough! In fact it is absolutely pathetic.I am empassioned in this review because I love this game. Unfortunately the muppets running it just don't care enough to look after all of their community.Shame on you PUBG corp. I've been holding out hope that you fix these few bugs that take away any joy I get from this game. But clearly I've been wasting my time. You made a great game and now you have ruined it. I am so sad and disappointed to be writing this review. This game had so much potential..... But you really crapped the bed.

review: I have never left a review before but i felt the need to state my utter dis satisfaction with the development team for this game. Awful false promises continually broken bugs laggy servers broken match making you name it. The game is so close to being great but the issues that hold it back entirely ruin it. Failed events says it all. Can't queue in my region (OCE) because it just puts me in Asian servers with 300 ping no option to change it. There was even a several month period where you couldn't queue in OCE.. Do not buy this game do not support these garbage money hungry developers.

review: An edited review... still on the positive side...There is way less lag than when I first wrote a review and the gameplay is a lot smoother. 4 maps now bring a lot of variety.. But you either choose one map or all maps.. you can't pick and choose a couple. Pretty sad in my opinion. And then.. you have death cams.. great right? Eh.. sort of.. someone shot me straight in the armpit and got a headshot. Straight. Not from below or anything. Straight. Or so the deathcam showed. And then a person shot all to the right of me as I was running left and yet...gets a headshot? Either people cheating or fix your death cams. A bullet is not going to go like that.
